title: BEST NYC HOTEL!!!!
text: Best experience at a hotel in NYC I've had yet. The rooms are beautiful and view is simply stunning. Everything is super clean and comfortable. Kristy is such an incredible person. She made my whole entire stay feel like I was at home. So caring, generous, and just always lovely. She helped me with anything and everything I needed and was always there for me to make sure all my needs were met. When you book with Modernhaus, make sure you meet Kristy because she will make your day!!!!!

title: A Vibe That Sets It Apart.
text:
The Modernhaus  Soho, a distinguished hotel, is close to all the buzzy action of the Soho. My King Studio was outstanding with it's wall of windows that afforded an abundance of natural light and stunning views of the cityscape. Wood floors, beige palette, blue popping fabrics, working desk area and let's not forget the wild & crazy mural over the headboard. The spa-like bath was outfitted with rain shower and heated floors. The 23 Grand is a geometry of spaces, an urban oasis with a collage of indoor/outdoor areas designed for communal dining activities. The Grand componentry is structured with a glass-enclosed dining room, a luxe lounge with an accompanying terrace, several outdoor elevated areas and a private event space. This eatery serves international flavors with a Mediterranean twist and the menu displays items such as : Tuna Carpaccio, Cauliflower Steak, Breaded Tile Fish and more......I selected a delicious duo of Butternut Squash Soup and Pappardelle. 18 floors up is the Jimmy,  a rooftop space featuring an outdoor pool deck and is surrounded by large windows for a panoramic view while sipping cocktails. The Jumping Jack is an eatery serving all day parts, configured in a coffee-cum-cocktail  lounge format. There isn't a spa but other wellness perks include a state-of-the-art gym. The sensational Aire Ancient Baths (& spa) is a quick 5 minute walk from the hotel.
So, if you are looking for a hotel that is remarkably different from any other one in NYC...........then try the......... Modernhaus Soho..........a vibe that sets it apart.

title: Would I go back ? Probably not.
text: I needed a base camp to raid Manhattan in spring, and the Modernhaus Soho did the job just fine and no more. Location, hospitality, amenities, design even the bar on the top floor : everything is fine but the whole experience lacks consistency to deliver the wow effect that the relatively high price point would suggest.  Would I go back ? probably not.

title: Positive Experience Great Staff
text: A short trip but a very positive one, this in part helped by the fantastic staff and their attitude to customer care. Room was spotless, spacious and full of light which helped provide a fresh place to relaxed. First visit but won’t be our last.

title: Elisa is the best
text: The shining star of my stay at ModernHaus was the room attendant, Elisa. Not only did she keep the room spotless despite having to deal with a lot of confetti (bachelorette), but she went out of her way to personally return something I left in the room. I am so grateful to her and because of her, I wouldn't hesitate to return to the hotel. Someone give this woman a raise!!

title: Comfy Modern Stay
text:
From the moment we walked in Kristy at the reception was attentive, caring and truly capture our needs. 
Kenny at the concierge was hands down the best. Overall thank you Modernhaus- you all did a phenomenal job- overall experience was amazing. Thank YOU!

title: Wonderful Staycation Spot!
text: I stayed  at ModernHaus SoHo for a recent birthday staycation. The staff was excellent and made my stay extra special- especially Caitlin! The bed was comfy and the room was so clean. Also, it was spacious for a NYC hotel, a rarity for sure. I definitely recommend this hotel

title: Beautiful Rooms, Friendly Staff, Lovely Stay!
text: I cannot speak highly enough about my time spent at ModernHaus SoHo! The room was absolutely stunning! It was super clean when I arrived, and had a beautiful bedroom view of the city at night with a very comfortable and stylish sitting area. I ended up enjoying staying in just as much as I enjoyed my time in the city itself. In-room dining was delicious, with quick and friendly service. Check-in itself was super smooth, and Caitlin at the front desk was incredibly helpful and sweet. She made sure I had everything I needed for my stay and even recommended really neat dining spots nearby for me to check out, all of which ended up being a hit for me. I don’t often see such above and beyond service during my travels, so it meant a lot to have that little extra care. I’m looking forward to having the opportunity to stay at ModernHaus again!

title: Great anniversary stay!
text:
The Hotel was absolutely amazing!! Caitlin and Ali help me at the front desk, they were so helpful. Isael, their manager, show me like 3 different rooms until we decided for one. It was one of the best NYC Hotel experiences we had!

Thanks, and hope to see you next year.

title: Great hotel in the heart of Soho
text: My second time staying here and many more to come. Location, staff and overall service is 10/10. The front desk always make sure to greet you with a smile, same with the guys at the door. Walking distance to all the stores in soho, to bars, restuarants and the subway.

title: Great hotel and staff
text: Caitlin was great - very helpful and answered all my questions. The room was spacious for NYC and the bed was  so comfortable . The hotel is in a great location in Soho. I highly recommend this hotel and I will definitely stay here again when I’m back in NYC.

title: 10/10 experience
text: Had such a lovely time staying here. From the moment I arrived, the service was incredible. Marc assisted me with booking and went above and beyond to make sure everything met my needs. He was professional, courteous, and truly made my stay exceptional. I would highly recommend this hotel. will definitely be staying here again next time I'm in town!

title: Unsanitary conditions
text: This place pretends to be fancy but they can't keep their curb clean. I stayed a couple times at the hotel and the rooms are OK. See photos attached. rates are crawling through their trash and big metal containers are blocking the street. I have contacted the staff and asked them to clean up their mess but the situation and not improved much.

title: Night of Our Lives
text: I stayed at Modernhaus SoHo on Valentine’s Day for a proposal to my now Fiancée and it couldn’t have been a more magical night with the help of the team at the hotel. Not only were they extremely accommodating with pre-planning items, ensuring that the easels were in the room prior to the night for my proposal setup, the hdmi connector was in the TV, and several team members ready to assist me with bringing my belongings, flowers and garland up to my room. Kenny, the bellman, was honestly probably one of the nicest and most kind gentleman I’ve ever met and Kristy, the front desk agent, texted me on several occasions to confirm I had everything I needed. In regard to the suite I stayed in, the view was second to none with its direct overview of the skyline, the glass walls connecting the bedroom to the bathroom was a special touch, and the bed sheets could not have been more comfortable. Thank you to the whole team for your support in making my proposal a night my fiancée and I will never forget.

title: ModernHaus shuts it down
text: This was my second time here as a little staycation. Kristy was great both times at check in, very nice and easy to check in with. Gisella and Alize were awesome at check out, funny and fast. I had a few questions about the bill and they were helpful with the answers.

title: Can I move in?
text:
Unparalleled experience staying here at Modernhaus, made the trip to NYC so much more special having a central accommodation that was also so stunning and actually made leaving the hotel so much harder. 

The staff were phenomenal, going above and beyond for the smallest details and were so friendly and approachable, had multiple dealings with Kristy and Ali during my stay and was so impressed and at ease with them both. 

Have already recommended the hotel to many friends visiting later this year and beyond as a must stay for when downtown, everything literally at your doorstep.

title: Great choice for SoHo
text: Wonderful hotel, very good rooms and nice staff in a great location in SoHo. Walking distance to Tribeca, Greenwich Village and West Village. Close to everything and at the same time, a quiet place. Many close subway stations. Definitely, a must stay for my upcoming trips to New York.

title: Loved this hotel!!
text: I loved staying here! Quiet room on the 12th floors- immaculate! And comfortable! Everyone was so nice. Great location - walk everywhere! Nice art too. I was worried when the hotel had new owners but everything f stayed pretty much the same and I'll keep coming!

title: Excellent soho stay
text: Decided to stay the night for my birthday and truly made the best decision in doing so.  My room was perfect on a high floor w a gorgeous view of the city.  They left a seeet card and a bottle of wine in my room to enjoy when I walked in.  They were able to secure me with earlier entry to my room and a nice check out.  Caitlin kept me updated on all via text, avail for any q’s as well.  Incredibly helpful and kind the entire stay.  Jimmy’s was a nice vibe on the rooftop and had a perfect cocktail in 23 Grand.  The entire staff was so nice (room service was esp). Soho loc perfect.  It was a fantastic birthday thanks to modernhaus.

title: Great stay!
text: Kristy and Max at the front desk were brilliant. Accommodated my requests and did so happily and with a great attitude. The hotel is clean and modern and great location. Cant go wrong. Loved my stay and recommend anyone visiting NY book here. Thanks again Kristy!

title: Very friendly staff.
text: The hotel staff were friendly and accommodating. They made perfect suggestions about getting around town, they accommodated our request for hypoallergenic bedding, and restaurant staff was knowledgeable about vegan options. They even recommended vegan restaurants nearby. Gisella and Caitlin at the front desk were very helpful.

title: Best hotel in NYC
text: A haven for the eccentric and the discerning, the Modernhaus SoHo is a whimsical playground for those who dare to be different. Its rooms are like living art installations, a kaleidoscope of bold colors, patterns, and textures that will make you feel like you've stepped into a Salvador Dali painting. The hotel's staff is as quirky and charming as the décor, always ready with a smile and a witty remark. Whether you're looking for a unique and unforgettable stay or simply a place to let your freak flag fly, the Modernhaus SoHo is the place for you.

title: Not suitable for a 5 star hotel
text:
There was a dog barking the entire night even though I asked to handle the issue, the TV streaming services weren’t working and the shower top head wasn’t operating.
I think that in a 5 star hotels such things shouldn’t happen .
The breakfast was below any kind of expectation surely not fabulous as it was stated on other reviews

title: Best anniversary ever, thank you
text: I stayed in the Modernhaus during the last week of December with my partner.  Stayed in the 14 floor.  The hotel does not only have amazing views but the staff members went above and beyond to make sure my anniversary was excellent.  They had noted that it was my anniversary, and I was welcomed with a bottle of champagne and a beautiful handwritten letter.  Also, the fact that the front desk knew about it and repeatedly congratulated us for it was just fantastic.

title: Beautiful Property and Welcoming Staff
text: The room and facilities were lean. I worked from the bar/café on the 2nd floor, and the staff was very helpful on things to do and see. In total, all the staff was welcoming, and I appreciated that. The rooms were spotless, and the room stewards even brought me extra water and left kind notes. I highly recommend this place. I did have issues with my room TV but forgot to mention it to the front desk.

title: Favorite hotel in Soho
text: I had an amazing stay at ModernHaus in Soho! The location was perfect, offering fantastic views. The room was spotlessly clean, and the service was outstanding. The staff made our anniversary special by surprising us with delicious cookies. Highly recommend!

title: Pessima experiência, o hotel e razoável
text: Pessima experiência, o hotel e razoável, quartos minúsculos, e bastante frio, o ar quente não funcionou, tivemos que mudar de quarto, funcionários simpáticos, mas que nao sabiam reservar uma mesa no nobu… achei a experiência ruim …hotel de 3 estrelas

title: Comfortable stay with beautiful views
text: Extremely comfortable stay! Room views were INCREDIBLE! Bed was super comfy. The room was incredibly spacious. Most NYC hotel rooms are so small. This one felt like a normal hotel room size. The room was also quiet and dark, ideal for sleeping. The location was great for us, between SoHo and Tribeca. Most of our plans were in this area so we were able to walk everywhere for the most part. I would recommend this hotel to anyone looking to stay in the SoHo area and we would definitely stay here again.

title: Excellent place in Soho
text: Amazing rooms (corner rooms) with a view, nicely decorated, ideally located between SoHo and Tribeca. We spent 3 nights with our 20 and 17 year old children. The quality of service is excellent. We highly recommend

title: Thank you Julian!
text:
An unforgettable experience! The hotel's breathtaking NYC-view room and top-notch service made our staycation unbelievable.  We came to celebrate our 35 years of friendship anniversary.  The staff went above and beyond to cater to our needs, Julian made sure we had all we needed throughout our stay. This was really memorable time and stay. title: Amazing experience in Soho
text: Amazing stay! Housekeepers are so sweet, The rooftop is fantastic with great music,drinks and a View to The Freedom tower and The recepcionists are great specially Caitlin and Gisella that were very helpfull

title: Good hotel at a good location
text: Excellent location in Soho, NYC within walking distance of all shops and restaurants.  Very clean and well-equipped rooms.  The beds are comfortable, shower water flow is good, and breakfast was OK.  Staff is friendly.

title: Most amazing time ever!!
text: We had the most amazing time at Modernhaus. The reception team was outstanding, very helpful, especially with the texting service. Anything you can possibly need, is just one text away. The rooms are for New York City standards, decently sized, beds are comfy. Our room had a nice view to SoHo and the views from the rooftop were simply amazing! We didn’t try the restaurant but it looked very good. The location is great! Lots of things to discover in the immediate neighborhood. Two subway stations very close. Overall, we had an amazing time and would definitely come back!

title: Amazing stay and front office team
text: We stayed in a Deluxe room and had the best time ever! The front office staff was so incredibly helpful with making reservations and giving recommendations for nearby restaurants. Views from the rooftop are stunning. We loved the area and would come back any time!

title: Great staff + location and that’s about it.
text:
What this hotel has going for it is amazing front desk staff and a great location. Other than that there’s a lot to be desired. 

Rooms are in rough shape. Lots of signs of wear and tear and cleanliness isn’t what one would hope. 

Upon arriving the staff was amazing but once we got up to our room the hallway was spackled and there were multiple room service trays outside of rooms. Once we got into our room I immediately noticed weird splatters on the wall, Lots of chipping paint, water rings and dust. The next day housekeeping left their dirty rag in our room on top of the clean cups we were planning on using. 

Pictures definitely miss the flaws. View was great and staff was excellent but there is no way I would ever return to this hotel.

title: Top Ausblick
text: Wir hatten für 8 Tage zwei Zimmer für eine Geschäftsreise mit der Familie gebucht. Die Aussicht  insbesondere aus dem Eck-Skyline Zimmer ist phänomenal. Die Ausstattung der Zimmer (auch der Deluxe Zimmer) ist sehr stylisch im Midcentury Stil. Das Hotel liegt zentral in Soho. Das Personal ist freundlich und hilfsbereit. Die Dusche wies beim Bezug des Zimmers noch Spuren der vorherigen Gäste auf, ansonsten war die Zimmerreinigung während des Aufenthaltes top. Die Heizung im Zimmer war bei Minustemperaturen draußen zunächst nicht warm genug, was aber letztlich geregelt werden konnte. Das Frühstück im Jumpin Jacks in der zweiten Etage war gut aber mit dem Budget aus der Frühstücksbuchung von 30$ pro Person etwas kompliziert zu handeln bei mehreren Zimmern und mehreren Personen, die zusammen frühstücken. Die Abrechnung dazu war beim Auschecken zunächst falsch, ließ sich aber nach längerer Diskussion korrigieren. Insoweit gab es einige kleine Mängel, die aber den Gesamteindruck nicht negativ beeinflusst haben. Insgesamt sehr zu empfehlen.

title: Perfect Spot for Our Ladies Weekend!
text: ModernHaus was the perfect place to stay for our Ladies Weekend.  The hotel itself was clean, stylish and conveniently located within walking distance of great shopping and restaurants.  Upon our arrival, we were greeted with a warm and friendly smile by Jay at the front door.  Check in was quick and efficient.  Our every request was fulfilled quickly and efficiently, especially by Julian who was so helpful and took great care of us during our stay!  We will definitely come back for our next NYC getaway.

title: Room wasn’t ready at 730. Shower didn’t work
text: We were in a rush at check-in at 730pm. Expected room was ready and we can shower quickly and get to dinner. Room wasn’t ready. From desk gave us attitude. Didn’t have time to shower. Returned to room at 2am. Shower didn’t work. Called to alert desk know but didn’t want to let them fix because we wanted to sleep. In morning manager gave us resort fee credit of $45 for check-in delay. He checked shower and it was working in the morning so said we either didn’t know how to work it or we were lying. Understand people do that but we weren’t lying. Building must have had a pressure issue.  Hotel location good. Room was fine otherwise. Hotel priced as a high-end luxury property. Room was more 3-star level at best. Shower should work.

title: Great location & rooftop bar
text: This hotel is conveniently located minutes from our office in SOHO. The rooms are spacious, clean and modern. Great views from the gym and a fun rooftop bar with cool music and hand crafted cocktails.

title: Moderhaus
text: Excellent hotel. The hotel is very clean, and the location is excellent. Our room had a magnificent view and the beds are super comfortable. Caitlin at the front desk made our trip wonderful and seamless! She is the best.

title: Great front desk service by Caitlin and Kenny
text: Caitlin and Kenny provided excellence service at the front desk. Always friendly and so helpful! I stayed for a long weekend with my daughter for her 21st birthday and we had a great stay. The hotel was in a great location and it is modern and bright.

title: The Best
text: This is the place for you if you like a perfect Downtown location with a comfortable and spacious room, super friendly staff who can help with any detail of your stay, and a great restaurant on the property.  Not to mention rain showers and a rooftop pool bar...IYKYK.  Kristy at the front desk is so kind and helpful!

title: We keep coming back
text: We’ve been coming to the spot for several years. We liked it as it’s not a chain hotel. We like the beds, the in room coffee,  We’ve been coming to the spot for several years. We liked it as it’s not a chain hotel. We like the beds the I room coffee, the views in the little outdoor spaces.

title: A Perfect Anniversary Experience
text: An unforgettable 10th anniversary weekend!  Modernhaus SoHo was absolutely perfect. It was clean, comfortable, great value, and location. On top of that when we arrived they surprised us with a free upgrade to their penthouse suite. I’m not sure who made that happen but it was one of the kindest, most generous acts by a hotel we’ve experienced. My wife and I were over the moon speechless and filled with gratitude. The room was breathtaking and it made an already special weekend truly one we will never forget. Thank you to Modernhaus, you have patrons for life!

title: Amazing! Exceptional Experience in NYC
text:
Our stay at ModernHaus was exceptional, and I must commend Spartak for contributing significantly to our outstanding experience. The hotel, a hidden gem, exceeded our expectations, offering a unique charm and sophistication.

Spartak's meticulous attention to detail and genuine hospitality were evident throughout our stay. His intuitive understanding of our needs and ability to elevate service to an art form made our visit truly memorable. ModernHaus, guided by its staff, is more than accommodation; it's an orchestrated symphony of service.

I express my sincere gratitude to Spartak for transforming our stay into an unforgettable escape. ModernHaus, with its sophisticated charm and personalized service, has earned our highest recommendation, and we eagerly look forward to returning for another exceptional experience.

title: Highly recommend
text: We loved our short stay at Modernhaus. The rooms are very spacious compared to Newyork Standard. I was worried about the noise from the streets but that’s not a problem at all. Allen was very helpful and professional . I had to change my room to a higher level of the building and he did that with ease. The bed was very comfortable, we even asked for a late check out. The location is great, everything is nearby. I highly recommend this hotel.

title: Looks great on the outside!
text: There are some truly good points about this place: convenient location, cool art, nice views, solid front desk help with immediate response to texts, decent café, early check-in, very comfortable bed, nice-sized bathroom, high-quality toiletries.  The problem is that the hotel has a thin veneer of quality - and when something breaks down, it appears that the system doesn't manage it well.  The first night we checked in, the room was insanely hot - no wonder, because the thermostat was set at 90 degrees!  So we opened our windows and rushed out to our dinner reservations, getting back late.  We got ready for bed, closed the windows (the traffic noise was extremely loud even on the 5th floor), turned the thermostat back on at a nice 68, settled into sleep, and I was awake 30 minutes later because the temps had soared back up to 82 - and were continuing to increase.  OK, so it was 1 AM, my 18 year-old daughter was sleeping through all of this, what to do?  According to the front desk the next morning, who chided me for not calling for maintenance immediately, I was supposed to - I don't know, get dressed, wake up my kid and get her dressed, and then wait for a maintenance person to show up... hopefully...to fix our thermostat in the wee hours of the morning.  Instead, I lost a whole night of sleep because our options were: 1) open windows and open curtains for cool air flow, with major NYC traffic noise from the busy intersection below (why must everyone honk constantly???) and bright lights flooding in, or 2) windows shut and quiet, but 90 degrees.  We did call for maintenance at 7:30 AM using the very helpful texting approach, and the repair was done some time after 1 PM, so that was nice.  We also got a $14 refund on a $600+ charge for that first night.  The room was basically useless to me, but I paid well for the privilege.  Oh, and the place is seriously in need of sprucing up.  Our room was clean, but my note above about the thin veneer wasn't just a metaphor (see photos).  I got much better sleep my second night, so when this place works as it's supposed to, it's perfectly fine.

title: Nice and very personal hotel
text: Hotel in good Soho-location (close walk to several subway stations, good restaurants in walking distance, etc.), nice interieur with newly renovated rooms, very helpful and friendly staff, excellent restaurant (Twenty-Three Grand), good breakfast and great views.

title: Soho at its best
text: Modernhaus is a beautiful hotel for a great Soho experience.  The rooms are very spacious with great views. They're also quiet and the temperature control is very good. The bathroom is really well lit and while it has only minimal surface space to put toiletries, at least it has some.  The closet is divided for his and hers which is a nice touch. There are bedside tables with a small drawer, another unusual feature in hotels these days! But there are no dressers or drawers for clothing storage.  And unfortunate oversight. However, the location is perfect and so many other features of the hotel are great.

title: Great hotel but exceptional pool and staff
text: The hotel was great but to be honest, our best experience was the pool on the roof and the service we received up there. Every single day, Spartak went above and beyond to make sure we had the absolute best time possible, a genuinely lovely bloke!

title: 5 Star NYC Experience
text: This hotel is truly incredible. The view from our room and the rooftop was absolutely breathe taking. The room was extremely clean and very comfortable. The staff was very friendly, helpful and made sure all our needs were met. Caitlin, Alize, Allen - all were extremely quick and happy to answer all of my questions and get me anything I needed at any hour of the day/night. The location is also perfect, right in the heart of Soho where the best restaurants, coffee shops, and retail stores are steps away. Couldn’t have asked for a better stay. Made my birthday weekend a trip I will never forget!

title: STUNNING HOTEL WITH AMAZING CUSTOMER SERVICE
text:
I had the best stay! The room was so nice and was always stocked with everything I needed. I loved the bathroom (there is a privacy screen as well that is nice and floors seemed to be heated, which I loved). The views were beyond stunning and the hotel is in the best part of SOHO. Great coffee shop across the street, stores to shop at, everything you need! 
Kristy who works at the front was beyond helpful. Honestly the best customer service I have experienced. She went above and beyond to make sure I was taken care of. I had some family come stay with me in my room and she helped make sure all my accommodations were met and exceeded. She made my stay and I will 100% be coming back. BEYOND the best hotel experience!

title: Floor minging and noise from lift deafening
text:
Dirty room. 
Unbelievable noise from lift rattling around room at all times. 
Told we couldn't be moved. 
We wasted £1400 staying here for three nights. 

P.s pool is barely a puddle (not big enough to swim in).

title: Splendida Esperienza a New York
text: Hotel davvero confortevole ed accogliente con personale gentile e disponibile. Un'esperienza davvero splendida vissuta a New York con mia moglie. Speriamo di ritornare, magari per visitare New Yor anche durante il periodo prenatalizio.

title: Loves Isael and his team!
text: We loved Kristy and Caitlin at the desk! We had a small inconvenience at check in, but Isael was amazing at sorting things out! They absolutely are a guest oriented hotel. They go out of their way to say good morning, to help you with restaurants. Housekeeping is on top of everything as well. They really care! Will recommend this hotel to all my friends!!!!

title: Contemporary Good Location Spectacular Views Excellent Service
text: Many of the rooms (at least ours) are corner rooms offering a wall-to-wall view of various parts of Manhattan. Rooms are relatively small (typical NYC) but very well designed and comfortable. Not enough closet space, limited places to put toiletries in the bathroom. Lighting is dramatic but not bright enough, overall. Bed was very comfortable. Everyone was cordial and very helpful. A bit of a hassle checking in because my wife arrived ahead of me and they wouldn’t let her check in because her name wasn’t on the reservation. It got worked out, though. Some minor maintenance issues: heavy rain caused the ceiling to leak in the entry way. It was enough to bring part of the ceiling down. Troubling to find out that this has been a problem for 4 years and has never been fixed. Overall, though, a great stay. Interesting shops and galleries in all directions.

title: Lovely hotel
text:
Lovely hotel, quiet, great facilities in-room, rooftop pool area fantastic, great location in an interesting but not too chaotic part of Manhattan. Very friendly and helpful staff.
Only negative was our room being almost directly opposite the two lifts, so there was a frequent low grade background noise, ,despite having requested a room as far from the lifts as possible.

title: Fabulous stay - luxurious accommodation and a great sleep
text:
The hotel is fabulous - lovely room with a great shower and beautiful products.
We had a lovely view  and had welcome prosecco and fruit as it was a special birthday.
Rooftop bar and pool was a bonus - a nice place to relax when the sun is shining and a great way to end the evening with a cocktail. Spectacular views.
All staff very friendly and helpful.
Quite expensive but maybe that was because of United Nations that particular week.
Everything was just perfect.

title: Soho Sophisticate
text:
First time that I stayed in Soho, usually it's midtown or Union Square area. I found the area very interesting, with many restaurants, shops and other trendy hotels nearby. The hotel has great art, with three big Harland Miller paintings in the lobby. Pity that one of them faces the glass lift and is hard to see. The rest of the hotel has got a lot of artwork and makes for a departure from the usual cookie cutter hotel chains which stick with safe, decorative art.
I had a corner room which was spacious and the bed was wonderfully comfortable, which is not always the case with other hotels.
The front office staff were cheerful and helpful, especially the night team of Alize and Kristy, who worked wonders in saving me from having to change rooms. Kristy especially is a big personality with a voice to match!
We used the restaurant only for breakfast as there were many good establishments in the neighborhood. I like jazz and within walking distance we had access to great music.
Having visited New York for decades, I find that it's always good to stay in areas I hadn't stayed before and this trip was a reminder of the diversity and color that the city has to offer.

title: Amazing, amazing, amazing
text: Kristy & the rest of the team at ModernHaus gave us the warmest welcome from the start and have done everything and anything to enhance our experience. As first timers coming to New York, staying here has been so easy. From the location to the amazing hospitality of the staff, it’s felt like a home away from home.

title: great location, clean rooms, friendly staff
text: i always choose to stay at ModernHaus on my trips to NYC. even if there are cheaper hotels, they are consistently good. every staff member is friendly. the rooms are clean. the location is great. they go out of their way to make me feel welcome with notes and check in texts.

title: Modernhaus Must!
text: Our flight was canceled and we ended up getting into anew York a day later than anticipated. Everyone at the hotel was so nice and helpful. Caitlin did an amazing job getting us comfortable and into a room as soon as possible. It was a great stay!

La piacina è moolto più piccola di quanto si vede in fotografia, ma c’è e si vedono dei tramonti incredibili.

A metà pomeriggio chiude perchè cambia gestione e diventa aperta anche per chi non è in albergo.
Insomma… il sabato e la domenica alle 2 di pomeriggio c’è già musica disco e party di persone esterne, un albergo così dovrebbe evitare di rovinare l’ambiente così.

Detto questo i cocktail non sono granchè, e i divanetti/lettini da soli sporchi zozzi. Ma la vista è mozzafiato.

Il servizio, sebbene tutti molto gentili, è disattento, la macchinetta del caffè con tutte le cialde vecchie usate, una richiesta di aprire la cassetta di sicurezza che dopo due giorni è ancora chiusa, un wifi che funziona a tratti.

Però devo dire che la posizione e la vista valgono un soggiorno.

title: Business Meeting
text: The hotel is wonderful.  The staff made sure all of our needs were met and made sure everything was as we expected for our meeting.  The penthouse was perfect for our meeting for 12 people.  Would book here again.

title: A jewel in NYC
text:
An exceptional experience
We had the pleasure to discover an incredible suite !
With an astoning view on 16th floor

The checking team was so nice and welcoming
The suite is huge and son confortable !!

Rooftop is such a nice view and ambiance with a DJ as it is the Jimmy’s at night
We ´ll be back

title: Perfect Stay
text: The location of the hotel is perfect. From there you can explore Manhattan perfectly on foot. A subway station is right next to the hotel. The rooms a large with great view. The staff is exceptionally friendly!

title: People are great here!
text: My husband and I spent 8 nights at Modernhaus on September 23! The place is beautiful, cool, has a great vibe but what makes it even better are the people who work there, such as Kenny who’s the best and makes things happen! He and Gisella are super pro active and anticipate all your needs. Least but no last minute important is the blond curly hair girl who knows anything about the city and gets you the best reservations and helps with all your needs. Such an awesome crew. The make this place even more special.

title: Simply no.
text: The experience at this hotel was awful. There is no service at all for guests. Room is very very outworn (toilet and sink peeling) and guest’s comfort is last hotels priority. Highlight: we have chosen this hotel because it’s too warm in NYC these times and there is a pool. At our stay, we couldn’t use it because was a private event happening there at 3:00 PM! 37 Celsius! Breakfast, despite of being inclusive during our stay for our fare it’s also awful.

title: Great experience
text:
Excellent service from Kenny 
Very attentive, accomodating and friendly
Will return again on our next trip 
Rooms are quite large as well bar was excellent and hotel was close to all amenities and sights

title: Excellent stay with great staff
text: Really helpful, kind and lovely staff who went out of their way to make our stay perfect including changing our room on request. The location was perfect, rooftop excellent and service as you would hope for from a good hotel.

title: If you have any allergies or asthma don’t stay here
text: The dustiest room I have ever stayed at.  Being asthmatic, dust allergens are the worst.  I brought this to management (Tobias) attention as I spent my time sick from the conditions.  Jimmy and Spartan are both assets to this small hotel and if it weren’t for their stellar services on top of an unfulfilled promise from management ensuring he would compensate for the disturbing effects dust allergens have on asthmatic person he’ll recompense for the room condition upon check out ( He gave us a credit OF $12 towards our bill.  Definitely NOT what you’d expect from a hospitality business especially when the costs per room are upwards of $1000 per night.  Thanks to Jimmy for helping my partner get around NY while I stayed under the weather using my breathing treatments stuck in a dusty room challenged by breathing.  Not what I was hoping for being a part of the choice hotel group.

title: Wonderful NYC Hotel Experience
text: Modern Haus is an absolutely fantastic hotel. Every dollar spent is worth it, with incredibly clean and stylish rooms and relaxation areas, to great service from all the staff. Having breakfast on the rooftop at the pool was one of the greatest experiences. Spartak was also an exemplary member of staff who served me and my wife extremely well. His kindness and hospitality made us feel very welcomed and appreciated. One of the most welcoming staffs we’ve ever experience at any hotel in NYC. Theres almost no negatives to say about our stay, we will definitely be staying again!

title: Must stay here !
text: Everyone was welcoming from check in to checkout , Pent house was extremely clean and beautiful with extremely great views . Finally , parking and food is everywhere ! No need to wonder , this is you’re que ! Book it now !

title: Excellent Stay
text: Staff incredibly friendly and helpful.  They checked in frequently to see if you needed anything.  They were able to place a bottle of wine in our room last minute.  I highly recommend here for a stay.  Good neighborhood.

title: Perfect Spot of Family Vacation
text: We stayed at Modern Hous for a family trip (2 teenagers) to NYC.  The hotel was perfect for what we were looking for.  We love the stylish vibes, the spacious (by NYC standards) rooms, the rooftop pool, and the location in Soho and near the Meatpacking District.

title: Girls weekend in the city
text: The staff was so lovely, and the room was PERFECT! Loved being by the pool with such great weather. We will be back!! (Sunday was a very chill vibe & Saturday was a bit more but it was the perfect combo)

title: Staff service was a bit disappointing
text: Great location and clean room. Hotel staff refused to help with carry the luggage from 1st floor to elevator floor (there are stairs you need to walk up to the elevator floor) and seems like it was a rule from hotel…

title: Amazing staff, clean hotel, great atmosphere
text: When you walk into modernhaus you are welcomed by the nicest people and their staff is so attentive and amazing!!! I love the atmosphere, and the area was key! For all the amenities included it was a great value In terms of the pricing. I will be staying at this hotel again!

title: Gorgeous boutique hotel in a great location and
text: The hotel is very close to the subway which made it really easy to get around Manhattan. Soho is a great spot - lots of little art galleries and shops, and walking distance to the other great villages downtown. The queen room was small but really well appointed with a gorgeous shower room. Loved the rooftop bar Jimmy’s for an evening cocktail - it had an older crowd there and great music and the view is just wow. Staff were all so welcoming. I will be back!

title: My favorite spot in the city.
text: This is my favorite hotel in NYC. It’s got a small, intimate rooftop bar & pool, Le Labo toiletries, and the coziest, prettiest little city view rooms in Manhattan. Kristy & Kenny provide the best experience you can imagine. Need dinner reservations? Need a car called? Need more divine smelling hand cream because you used the entire bottle that was in your room? Need someone to chat with when you come back from a team dinner feeling tipsy & friendly? They got you. I’ve stayed here two of my last four trips to NYC and I think I’m just going to refuse to ever stay in another hotel here again. ModernHaus is my spot and I’m not willing to compromise.

title: Great Soho Hotel
text: Our recent visit to Modernhaus was exceptional.  We've been to New York on several occasions and this is by far the best hotel experience we have had.  Kristy and Kenny were wonderful to deal with and provided great customer service on our arrival, during our stay and departure.  The rooms were clean and comfortable and offered a great view of the city.  The rooftop bar and pool was a great place for a drink with great views of the skyline.  We would recommend this hotel if you are looking to stay in Soho.

title: BEST Hotel In SOHO
text: ModernHaus is my home away from home. Kristy at the front desk exceeds all expectations with making every stay memorable starting with  the warmest welcome to always anticipating needs and accommodating without having to ask for a thing.  The best team in NYC hospitality.

title: Disappointing experience
text: Not a cozy hotel. Rooftop not accessible after 14.00/16.00 for under 21, so no swimming for the kids in the afternoons. Airco fan can only be on high, blowing in your face while sleeping. Staff did not help to resolve. Overall disappointing experience, certainly for the money charged.

title: Great location and staff at front desk
text:
Great location and loved the view from the rooftop and the swimming pool. 
The room was fine, comfortable beds and breakfast was lovely but what made the stay was Kristy at the front desk and Jimmy! The where both super friendly, very helpful and nice. We will definitely be back and mostly because of their great service

title: Great Staff and Location
text: Loved this hotel and the location, there was a nice bodega next door and was right around the corner from a subway station. The staff was very friendly and the rooms were clean and I loved that the bathrooms had heated floors it was a great touch. Would rebook.

title: Go see Kenny!
text: Rarely do I enjoy unique experiences at hotels, but ModernHaus, Soho delivered.  From the complementary Oysters freshly shucked on the rooftop, to the advice and action taken to minimise my costs while traveling in NYC.  Coordinating it all and absolutely central to my overall experience at the hotel was Kenny.  I’m not sure what his job actually is, but from bags to transport, from itinerary to concessions, Kenny was there and absolutely on point with everything.  With no disrespect to NY intended, frankly service is utterly amateur relative to what I experience as the norm in Asia most of the time.  Yet Kenny defied NY’s typical service nonchalance to deliver personal, genuine and top class service perfectly.  If you’re going to NY, stay at ModernHaus, Soho, and demand Kenny as your man at the hotel!  Brilliant!

title: Rooftop pool
text:
Modernhaus is a beautiful and VERY clean hotel. Love the restaurant area and especially the rooftop pool. I purchased a room that included access to the pool. When I got there, all of the seats were taken, but luckily some of the visitors left a few minutes after I got there. 
Spartak was extremely helpful and made made me feel at home. He coordinated seating, took my food order and even helped guide me on where certain places were in the hotel. Helped with providing towels and taking our food trays away. Thankful Spartak was there to help. 

Janie Luis

title: Great views, amazing pool and staff
text: Beautiful hotel with amazing views! Visited for anniversary weekend. The rooftop pool is reserved for hotel guests up until 2pm which is a main reason we chose this hotel. Pool overlooks city sky scrapers and was so clean. Spartak, the lifeguard on duty, was amazing. Made sure everyone had what they needed. Very hospitable and gave great recommendations for places to visit in the city. Would definitely return!

title: Best hotel in sosh
text: I spend hours into comparing hotel in NY this hotel is clearly the best values for money ! Beautiful room , nice employee who are here since long event housekeeper  , amazing view , no resort feed this hotel They know how to taking care of you nice bathroom product nice bar.

title: Great stay
text:
Very nice hotel.
Great service from the staff. Big shout out to Kenny for arranging transportation:-)

Breakfast is great, and the room was very much like you see at their website. Spacious and clean!

title: Highly recommended
text: Great staff - very friendly and helpful. clean rooms, prime location - we walked to downtown, times square and more. Great facilities - Jim, rooftop, terrace, restaurant (great breakfast!!).  I'll definitely return

title: Great hotel in NYC
text: I had a great experience in the Modernhous Hotel. The stuff was super nice, professional and polite. The room was clean and big in comparison to hotels in NYC. Prime location in the Soho neighborhood.

title: GREAT HOTEL AT THE HEART OF SOHO
text:
Exceptional service. Very clean and friendly hotel. It has a nice pool to cool down during a hot summer days.
We were very impressed with Lisa, our room was fully cleaned and organized every single day. The staff deserves an applause.

title: Loved this place!
text: Love this place! Most comfortable bed, good view, clean space. My favorite part was the staff :) the cleaning lady was so diligent and helpful— and kind! She shut the curtains for me when I had a bad headache🥺 also Michael Daniel’s was incredible! Super personable and never rushed interactions which made me feel super comfortable and gave a sense of community within the hotel :) the rooftop; AMAZING! Definitely worth it. Also SOHO is one of my favorite locations in the city. The lady at the front desk gave great suggestions :) I enjoyed every minute of being here.

title: THE BEST HOTEL IN SOHO. Thank you Andrew!!!!!
text: ANDREW!!! My mom and I were greeted by Andrew who had the best energy the second we walked in. He went above and beyond for us and by the end of the trip he felt like a close friend who we did not want to leave! We initially had only planned on staying at ModernHaus SoHo for a night (because we wanted to explore other hotels and neighborhoods) but we ended up staying an extra night because of how much we enjoyed Andrew and the entire hotel and its amenities. We would have stayed a third night if they had availability, but they were all sold out and for a good reason. The hotel itself is MAGIC. The rooftop pool and bar was one of the most beautiful and trendy places I’ve ever been. We went up there for sunset and got some amazing photos of the skyline and a delicious watermelon spicy margarita. We danced a little and loved the crowd because it was a mix of younger and older people. Music was great. Then there’s the restaurant bar Twenty Three Grand where I had truly the most delicious spicy skinny margarita I have ever had. The restaurant itself has the coolest decor and the best curried spinach dip that we ended up getting twice because it was so good. The rooms are PHENOMENAL for the price and size. They are a bit small but ended up feeling so big because of the glass bathroom walls (there’s a curtain that goes up and down for privacy). Andrew checked in on us throughout the day via text which I love and was so convenient. We will be retiring to ModernHaus in the future 1000% will be bringing my boyfriend back with me. And they are dog friendly! So I’ll be bringing my dog next time too. I can’t say enough amazing things about this place I did not want to leave. Oh and it’s in a good safe place that feels open and clean. And there’s a great bakery across the street and just a short walk from West Village for shopping and food. 20/10 recommend. Thank you Andrew you have become part of our traveling family!!!

title: highly recommended location, service & experience!
text:
The customer service and overall experience are top-tier at ModernHaus!!! Shout out to Kristy & Andrew for the above-and-beyond service at the front desk!!

Special thanks to Jenna, Annie & Darnell for accommodating our last-minute event in the Signature room!! You all helped make the event special and were there to address all of our requests in a timely manner.

The JIMMY rooftop is beautiful as well, highly recommended location & experience!

title: amazing hotel
text: I will always stay here when I come to NYC, the service is amazing, the rooms are beyond clean, the food is so yummy, i am very happy and pleased. great location as well. The rooftop pool is beautiful

title: Perfect spot! Amazing staff!
text: I want to give a specific shout out to some key people!! People can truly make it break an experience!! Spartac from the pool service was incredible. He gave tips for great local spots, made us feel welcome and answered my many questions. Andrew and Kristi from the front- were incredible. Sent me tons of tips, let me bother them with a million questions and honestly just made us laugh. They were so kind. The team is lucky to have all these people!! I will definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Above and beyond experience!
text: I had the pleasure of staying at ModernHaus Soho during a business trip, and I was truly impressed by the warm welcome and exceptional service I received. The hotel boasts incredible views, and the staff is top-notch. One thing that sets this place apart is that they don't require reservations for the pool, making it a hassle-free experience. Spartak, in particular, went above and beyond to make me feel at home. I didn't even have to leave my lounge chair as he catered to every request with unparalleled attention to detail. The entire staff at ModernHaus deserves appreciation for their efforts in ensuring that guests have a worry-free and enjoyable stay. When you're away from home, the last thing you want is to worry about anything, and they made sure of that. Highly recommended for both business and leisure travelers!

title: Amazing Help from Spartak
text: Spartak was super welcoming when I first arrived. My room was not ready yet so I walked around and ended up on the rooftop where he was working. He was super easy to talk to and gave me A LOT OF AMAZING tips, tricks, and recommendations of what to do in NYC because it was my first time. He honestly was the best and really appreciate the help from him to plan out my trip.

title: Modern Haus Excellent Experience
text: We had a wonderful time, Spartak was the most helpful, hospitabal and kind host we’ve had at Modern Haus. He made our experience at the rooftop pool as comforting and accomodating as possible. Spartak is an excellent worker and addition to the Modern Haus team, we will definitely return for his kindness and the entire Modern Haus staffs hospitality!

title: greatest nyc hotel experience

title: Neighborhood Gem in Soho
text:

My husband recommended it and I enjoyed walking around the amenities, even though I did not have time to use them!

title: The best of the best in Soho
text: This was one of the best hotel experiences I had had in a while. The service was wonderful, we were upgraded and got food and drink credits. We booked our stay through Amex and that’s where the credits and upgrades came from. Beautiful views. We loved the cafe, where we had breakfast and used our credits. I adored all of the little details of the cafe - I looked up the hand made mugs they served my latte in and they were out of my price range. Lol. We love everything about our stay.

title: Great, classy hotel in Soho

Glimrende hotell med perfekt beliggenhet , nydelig takterrasse med basseng, og fantastisk 180 graders utsikt fra rommet over Tribeca, Soho, Financial district m m

text:
We loved our stay st ModernHaus. Location is amazing. Rooftop pool is a WIN with gorgeous views of the city. Breakfast at Jumping Jack was just right with GOOD COFFEE! And most of all, all the staff were really lovely, friendly, helpful, and altogether fabulous. There is a GREAT ambiance with the staff and the place, from cleaning staff to front of desk, to bell boys. Highly recommend.

My only critical comment would be just one of storage space in the rooms with no real cupboard space, but hey, who cares?!

title: Great Boutique Hotel
text: Overall I had a great experience. The hotel is in a convenient location. The restaurant and food was top tier. Only downside would be the servers at Jimmy’s rooftop bar. Waited about 30 mins to be greeted. The rooftop provides gorgeous views on NY and the pool is the main reason why I booked the stay. Other than that, I would recommend to my friends and family.

title: ModernHaus Soho outstanding hotel
text: Every person at ModernHaus Soho was focused on customer satisfaction. Clean and spacious rooms, excellent food and service in restaurant. Must say the cauliflower steak was a most unique and delicious offering. The 4th of July party was a blast! I had small issue and staff was ultra cooperative and kind in resolving. Look forward to staying again.

title: Peaceful space in a busy city
text:
I stayed for a week while in New York for business and the hotel was lovely. It was close to everything I needed, including a local subway stop.
And the room was well equipped. The open glass bathroom style was nice, and the amenities were all great. 
The rooftop pool was so great, and the in-house restaurant was so lovely and did a great room service breakfast.
I will happily stay here again and have already recommended to friends.

title: Beautiful views, modern rooms, Incredible hospitality and service
text:
We had the BEST stay at ModernHaus SOHO. Located at a fantastic spot in the city with beautiful pool rooftop and excellent views. The staff, particularly Andrew at the front desk, was exceptional!!! Andrew was so positive,  friendly, so very helpful throughout our stay! Our time was certainly a memorable one thanks to Andrew and the hospitality of the hotel!!

We hope to be back soon!

Tiffany

title: Incredible
text: Incredible experience staying at this hotel. Location is perfect; rooftop bar and pool are trendy and guests have access without waiting in any lines. Love the Le Labo products in the rooms. By far the best customer service I’ve experienced at a hotel. Everyone was so friendly and kind; especially Andrew at the front desk who made the experience so special. He is a gem and more businesses need people like him. I highly recommend this hotel and would definitely stay here again.

title: Will most definitely come back!
text: Probably one of the best hotels I've ever stayed at! Rooms were fantastic with amazing views, the restaurants were great and the rooftop has an amazing vibe. By far the friendliest and most helpful staff I've ever experienced at a hotel. Kristy, at reception is just an absolute ray of sunshine that made our stay 10x better! Would highly recommend!

title: Great balance
text:
In the middle of things to do without being loud
Upscale feel without being stuffy
Multiple amenities and facilities without being confusing
Rooftop pool which in NYC is a must-have
Fantastic service at the front
Incredible views

title: Best service EVER!
text: Love it! Kristy/Andrew checked me in, they were an amazing combo! They seem like they really enjoy what they do. They worry so much about our overall wellbeing. From food recommendations, housekeeping requests, to how was my day. I was certain that coming back in the evening I'll get a great  couple of smiles and a good conversation.

title: All-in-one Package- Awesome Hotel & Location
text: From the minute we arrived we were greeted with exceptional service. Kenny the bellman and Kristy were very generous and friendly. Melina? I think was the girl who checked us in, our room was behind so in compensation she gave us drink tickets. We stayed in the skyline view king room- 10/10 recommend. Perfect way to start your mornings. Great size room. Thirty three grand had a beautiful aesthetic to match the delicious food. Jimmy bar and rooftop was also breathtaking. We felt like we had the entire package staying at Modernhaus Soho. Great stay and location. We would recommend and stay here again 👍🏼

title: Great SoHo spot
text:
We enjoyed a fantastic stay at ModernHaus in late May as part of a trip to NYC to celebrate our wedding anniversary. We loved the hotel's vibe: staff could not have been more helpful, friendly and personable; the rooftop bar was buzzing, and the art-led interior design created a sense of serenity in the midst of Manhattan.
Our corner room was beautifully designed, with excellent amenities and super views downtown. We even borrowed the hotel's own bicycles (free!) to make an all-day circuit around the island - surely one of the best ways to see and experience the Big Apple.
Modernhaus is also surrounded by great bars, restaurants and shopping - we particularly recommend Milady's on the corner of Prince and Thompson nearby. Overall: a first-rate but still cool hotel that we would love to return to.

title: Felt Like a VIP & Home at the Same Time
text:
On me and my wife’s most recent trip to New York City, which was a mix of business and vacation, I have to give the Modernhaus Soho an A+ on everything: the food at Jumpin’ Jacks (on the second floor), the drinks + views at the rooftop bar/pool at Jimmy’s, along with the entirety of the guest services staff provided my wife and I during our 6 day stay. Unfortunately, we did not get a chance to dine at Twenty-Three Grand, the adjoining restaurant at the hotel. 

As they say, first impressions go a LONG WAY and I want to especially call-out three individuals on Modernhaus’ Guest Services Team: Kristi, Andrew, and Eric. I’ll begin with Eric because when our Uber dropped us off in front of the hotel (from the airport), he immediately recognized that we had a TON of luggage and met us out in the middle of the street to help us unload and get everything situated during the check-in process. 

Next, big shout outs to Andrew and Kristi! 

We were genuinely greeted upon crossing the threshold of the hotel and they made us feel like VIPs and old friends at the same time. As a result of this, I immediately felt at home and was super excited about our extended stay. This, and one of our other friends was due to join us and also stay at Modernhaus - in her own room - and Andrew went out of his way to make sure she got everything she needed because we were also in possession of some of her luggage. Andrew was masterful at helping manage some of the many “moving pieces” between dealing with us and our soon-to-check-in friend. This, and Andrew hooked her up with some of the hotel’s special and delicious cookies! 

We were fortunate enough to see Kristi throughout most of our stay at Modernhaus, and where do I start? She was super helpful and informative on where to eat in SoHo/Tribeca, plus she pointed us to the hotel’s published list of food recommendations. In addition, Kristi satisfied my request for the hotel’s special cookies, not once, but twice because I have a MASSIVE sweet tooth. Every time we saw Kristi, me and my wife often walked away smiling and feeling GOOD. 

Also, Kristi was always spot on with her recommendations. For example, when we wanted a drink at the hotel’s adjoining restaurant on-property - Twenty-Three Grand - Kristi recommended we try the Mai Tai. I opted to have not one, but two Mai Tai drinks…and they were both outstanding!! When we needed an iron and some extra hangars, Kristi made sure we got them…and they arrived with minutes of being requested. No question ever seemed too simple, or need felt minor, Kristi was ON IT! Most important, what’s not to like about a member of Guest Services giving you an initial tour of the hotel and walking you to your room upon check in? Kristi definitely made Modernhaus feel like home, and she is a shining example of an entire team of people at Modernhaus - who’s names I did not get or capture - who exuded top notch professionalism and service. 

Well done and I shall return the next time work & pleasure brings me to New York. Thank you, THANK YOU!! 

  PS: The music played in this hotel was on point! From Jumpin’ Jacks to the elevators, to Twenty-Three Grand, to Jimmy’s. ALL GOOD!!

title: Very Helpful Team
text:
The ModernHausSoho is a high quality hotel with outstanding service. Kristy and her Team are always available to answer any questions or address any issues promptly. My 18 year old daughter’s flight was canceled from New York and she had to stay alone in the city for 5 days. Not only did the hotel make sure she arrived safely, they also helped her with her luggage and constantly reassured her.
I would not hesitate to come again!

title: Best hotel in the best location!
text: Amazing hotel in a fabulous location. The staff were so friendly from start to finish (big shout out to Andrew who made us feel so welcome for the entirety of our stay). The rooftop pool, bar & views are also incredible! The room was spacious with a great cityscape and it was so appreciated having my birthday celebrated with a comp bottle of cava! Can’t wait to come back & highly recommend :)

title: Top level service
text: The hotel is in a great location, it’s very pretty, the beds are very comfy and the view from the rooftop bar is incredible - but Kristy on the front desk was the star of the show for me and my partner. A ball of energy and knowledge - she made us feel so incredibly welcome. We only stayed for 2 nights but by check out, it felt like saying goodbye to a friend. I really hope Modernhaus look after her well.

title: Kristy and Andrew angels in new york!
text: Sometimes the magic happens, some people some places are out of the ordinary, and there I found a hotel in the heart of New York, where hearts beat at 100 per hour of kindness generosity and service at a higher level. At the entrance I discovered two extraordinary people Kristy and Andrew. They satisfied my dream access to a magnificent room with a sublime view thank you a thousand times you are the angels of New York City.

title: Lovely hotel
text: I had a very comfortable stay at the hotel and the staff were really helpful. Andrew Hayes was always available when I needed assistance and the overall experience was nice. I will definitely recommend.

title: Loved, loved, loved our stay at Modernhaus!
text: The staff were all great- friendly, professional, welcoming and smiling! We ate at Jumpin’ Jacks for breakfast both days and everything was yummy! Service impeccable. The rooms were clean, the beds and pillows super comfortable. The shower pressure was great. Andrew H checked us out, thanked us for our stay, took care of storing our luggage. Just loved our whole experience at Modernhaus and will definitely be back!

title: 5 star experience!
text: My gf and I enjoyed our stay. Our room had a beautiful skyline view of the city. Staff was super friendly and attentive. Appreciate that I could text me for any questions and requests. 2nd floor cafe was perfect for remote work. Rooftop was cool. Unfortunate we had bad weather we were there but pool made the hotel worth booking. Will stay here again!

title: Wow amazing
text: Best hotel in Manhattan. Service was unbelievable  and rooftop was great. I will stay here every time I am in Manhattan. Restursnt was also spectacular it was recently renovated so it was very special. I also love the neighborhood it was next to great restaurants.

title: NYC girls trip
text: Great service   Fun. Easy location. All good. Pretty place. So fun. Close to shopping and food. Had a really great experience. I want to give a special mention to Andrew Marc and Kristy! The rooftop view is beautiful!

title: Great experience!
text:
Great experience across the board, super comfy bed, clean room, amazing views, good service. Andrew Hayz at the front desk was incredibly helpful.
Location is perfect, just three blocks from all the super fancy stores. Nice restaurants close by. The subway is just a block away.

title: Amazing go-to hotel in SoHo
text: Highly recommend ModernHaus SoHo for a hotel stay in NYC for business or for fun. I've stayed here at least four times now, and it has become my go-to spot. Love the location - very accessible to walking all over downtown and to the subway. Rooms are always clean with a great modern design. The rooms are also a good size compared to many other NYC hotels I've stayed in. Lovely views from the rooftop pool and bar. All of the staff is so friendly and willing to help.

title: Incredible hotel, incredible staff! Highly recommend
text:
Caitlin, Melina, Gisela, Angelique and Julian and the rest of the staff made us feel at home and very welcome. Truly one of the best hotel experiences. 
We travelled for work and they made our stay so easy. The hotel is waking distance to the best shops and restaurants! Gracias!!

title: Fabulous hotel and staff!
text: ModernHaus Soho is a great hotel! We stayed in a corner room the first week of May 2023. Loved the size of the room and all of the windows. Location was great with many restaurants and subway within walking distance. The best part was the staff. The 5 boroughs bicycle race was in progress on our check-out day. Traffic was blocked off and we were worried about getting to the airport. Thomas and Caitlin arranged for transportation and Jimmy escorted us along with our bags a few blocks to the car they arranged. Everyone at the desk and door were always so friendly and accommodating. Will definitely stay here again on our next trip to NYC!

title: Great experience
text:
ModernHaus was everything I look for in a stay. The room was nicely sized and clean. Great views of the city. Finishes in the room and bathroom were particularly nice. It was probably the best shower I have ever experience in a hotel.

On top of the in-room experience, they have a small but high-quality fitness center with stunning views. Best part of the hotel is the location – walking from Canal street subway stations and directly in SoHo.

title: 10 stars!
text: Modernhaus was amazing! The room was clean and modern, the gym is equipped for a good work-out with an incredible view, jumping jacks has great coffee, twenty-two grand restaurant was first class and absolutely delicious, and the rooftop pool is so luxurious and unique in NYC! To top it off, the staff goes above and beyond to make it a five-star experience. Special thanks to Caitlin and Christy for being so helpful during our stay! We’d recommend Modernhaus to anyone headed to NYC!

title: Stay here
text: Melina was incredible. Very helpful with our rebooking for this coming November. Staff was super helpful w/o being imposing. Perfect amount of top notch service, if needed. Otherwise they will just chill. Clientele is young and fun. Location is great if you’re looking for that soho experience. Highly recommend.

title: Amazing location and the friendliest staff
text: ModernHaus is a great hotel with the friendliest staff I have ever experienced. I was very nervous when we arrived as there is a lot of construction outside. However, we were moved to a very quiet room on the back side of the hotel and the construction ended up being not very loud and not on the weekend. The location is right by the Canal Street Subway so you can get to anything in NY and also walked to everything in SoHo. I will definitely be staying here every time I visit NYC. The staff are top-notch and will immediately help with anything you need.

title: Night in Soho
text: The service was outstanding and the room was extremely comfortable. The roof top views were excellent. The best part was watching Kristy work the front desk. She made everyone feel special and went above and beyond. I was simply fascinated watching her work. I would highly recommend this hotel!

title: Great hotel and professional staff.
text:
Extremely friendly and professional staff. Especially Kenny and Gisella.

Great location. Great downtown views.

Modern vibe but not overly hip.

Thanks for a lovely stay. We’re already planning for this hotel on our next visit to nyc. Until then. Cheers Modernhaus.

title: Definitely Recommend...
text: We travel to NYC often and usually stay at the SoHo Grand.  Decided to give ModernHaus SoHo a try to mix it up, and glad we did.  Stayed here back when it was the James, and the changes they've made are excellent.  Room was great, the rooftop bar has unparalleled views of lower Manhattan and the customer service was TOP NOTCH.  Many thanks for Kristy for always checking in on us and for giving great tips and recommendations.

title: Nice stay with great amenities
text: Stayed here when I had a short business trip to New York. The amenities were great and got a nice view of the city as well. Everyone was extremely friendly as well. There were some nice coffee shops nearby as well which made it convenient to snag something before work.

title: Amazing hotel in SoHo
text: The hotel is modern, cute and very conveniently located in SoHo. So many great shops and restaurants around! Angela, Nathan and the rest of the staff were so accommodating and helpful. They made our stay wonderful by helping us set up reservations and sending cookies up to our room for our anniversary. Also the view from the gym is insane! Highly recommend.

title: Couples get away
text: Amazing place and experience. Location was great. Rooftop bar was excellent and the staff was very accommodating. Room was fantastic. Bed super comfortable and they had two bottles of wine waiting for us at check in! It was our anniversary:)

title: Great Stay!
text: I had such a lovely stay here! Angela checked me in and was so accommodating with my every need! She would text me periodically throughout my stay asking if I needed anything, and I would often get water refilled (very useful if you love filtered water like me!) the hotel is in a safe area, a lot of good food spots. Really enjoyed the stay, I normally don’t write reviews but honestly loved every minute of my time there.

title: Great week in NYC at Modernhaus Soho.
text: I spent an amazing week in NYC staying at Modernhaus Soho. The room was great, location amazing and staff so helpful and welcoming. Anthony helped me out before I even arrived, Kristy and Angela were so friendly and always ready with recommendations for restaurants and Sam made us feel welcome every time we visited the lounge on level 2. All in all Modernhaus was a great success for our trip.

title: Highly recommended!
text: We had such a great week in NY at the Modernhaus Soho. Doormen Jimmy and Kenny always welcomed us with a smile and organized anything we needed, as did Antony from guest relations (Isa is so happy with her bubble cream ;-) The girls at the reception were awesome too. Thanks all!

title: Awesome place, super friendly employees!
text: Everything was excellent. Clean room, very friendly employees, and incredible food! Perfect location to walk around NYC and spend with your significant other. I would book here again the next time I come to the city

title: Best stay in Soho!
text: The modern Haus was a great place to stay in NYC, specifically Soho. There was so many places near by like shopping and restaurants with good ratings. The staff was wonderful and did everything to accommodate us!

title: Outstanding Staff, Location and Hotel!
text: Modernhaus was a great place to stay! Excellent location! The staff Kenny, Caitlin and Gisella were outstanding, made us feel special! We had an amazing view, bed was comfy and a nice large shower! We would highly recommended and definitely stay again!

title: Exemplary guest service
text:
The guest service at Modernhaus Soho is truly outstanding!  From check-in and help with special requests with Kristy. to arranging car service with Kenny, the Modernhaus Soho team makes guest service a top priority.  As a frequent business traveler, I can say that the attention to the guest experience is exemplary. 

Audrey

title: Great
text: Angela and Christy are awesome❤️Held our levain cookie for us at the front desk so sweet best time ever ! Such a nice anniversary time with my boyfriend ! The rooftop is so perfect. Staying here again next time in town

title: A True Gem - 5/5!!!!
text: A perfect gem of a hotel located on the fringe of SoHo. Excellent location close to the subway and so quiet! Big rooms with Le Labo toiletries and huge picture windows. Comfy bedding. Exceptional customer service from the front desk -Angela, Anthony- to the doormen who were friendly and attentive. Breakfast at Jumping Jack’s where Sam provided excellent service and a beautiful smile. The rooftop bar, Jimmy’s, was hopping and bartenders were on point and poured delicious martinis and manhattans. If you want a great stay in a safe location and want to be treated exceptionally well, this is the place! Thank you all for making the stay with my New Yorker daughter so memorable.

title: Great location. Over priced. Dated room.
text: The location couldn’t have been better. It was close to two subway lines and sits between Greenwich Village and soho. We easily access uptown and downtown and all the areas in between. The hotel adds a $45 nightly facility charge. When I asked, it was explained that was covering the cost of the filter tapwater, which was free in the room, as well as the coffee maker. The room is somewhat dated. The floors and the bathroom seem quite old. The lighting in the bathroom is terrible. Perhaps the worst part of the room is the air conditioning system which is either on full blast and freezing or is off. The breakfast, which was included in our room, was very good. The breakfast room is sunny and bright, and the servers are very kind and professional.  our phone was broken and we were not fixed find how to access the roof until our third night. The roof is absolutely fabulous to enjoy the views of the city. I’m not sure I would stay there again because the hotel is quite expensive for the quality of the room.

title: Modernhaus Soho 10/10
text: Our stay was amazing!Caitlin and Kristy are so kind and were super helpful & available during our whole stay. Any questions/requests were always answered quickly. Looking forward to coming back! 10/10

title: Perfect stay
text: We will definitely stay here again. Our room was comfortable, clean and quiet. Great location. Very friendly staff including Angela, Caitlin and Gisella who always made sure we had everything that we needed. Highly recommend

title: Above and Beyond at ModernHaus
text: We really enjoyed our time at this hotel.  Kristy at the front desk went above and beyond to make our stay memorable.  She gave 5 star concierge service to this first visit to NY.  And a special shout out goes to the cleaning lady named  Edlira.  We originally said we didn’t need our room cleaned one day, then on the way out she asked if we were sure.  My wife changed her mind.  Not only did Edlira enthusiastically accept this last second change, but the room was spotless when we returned.

title: Extraordinary Staff and Service! We will be back again this summer.
text: We have had multiple stays at your hotel. Maurice made our last stay and the days we spent at the pool, enjoyable and relaxing. He was very helpful and clearly very dedicated to the service he provides his guests. Maurice is truly an asset to your hotel and company. We thank him and all ModernHaus Soho staff and will be back again!

title: Great experience
text: Beautiful hotel, fantastic views but most importantly excellent staff! Always helpful, with great recommendations, from restaurants to nail salons. Kristy in particular is amazing!! Will be going back for sure

title: ModernHaus - Couldn't ask for a better hotel!
text:
first off, the staff is super helpful! they regularly checked in via text\phone to make sure whatever we needed was take care of. the room we had has enough room and space for 2 people. this place has everything you need if you don't want to venture off for food. we definitely will stay at this place again for our next adventure in New York. also, having it near a metro station helps out so much! was able to get here from JFK\Jamaica Station with no problem. Highly recommend this hotel. 

Thanks again to the staff at ModernHaus
-Anthony
-Caitlin
-Melina
-Isael
-Angela
-Kristy

We hope to see your team again in the near future.
-Allan\Xylene

title: Granddaughter's 13th birthday trip to NYC
text:
My 13 year old granddaughter and I stayed at the upscale Modernhaus Solo for 5 days. We had a very nice corner room on 9th floor. Nice size room. The location is very close to subway and nice location to explore Soho.
The staff is warm and welcoming. They were very helpful with directions and suggestions. 
All were very sweet with my granddaughter, especially Caitlin, Evelin and Jimmy.
I highly recommend a stay at this hotel.

title: Great stay in soho!
text: My time at modernhaus was amazing! All of the staff were very helpful and accommodating, especially Melina who check me in and out and checked up on me to make sure I was happy with my stay. The rooms have a beautiful view, great rooftop bar & restaurant, and again very helpful & friendly staff! 10/10

title: Express stay in Soho
text:
I trave frequently to NYC, and this was my first time in Modern haus. (Next time I'm in the city I'll definitely try Veranda, the food seems great).

Angela and Isael at check in were amazing. I had a little hiccup at check in, but it was resolved in less than 5 minutes + a bottle of wine! Customer service is out of this world. 

See you in a couple of months, I'll be back

title: A nice place for a Manhattan stay’s
text:
Very comfortable hotel , clean and well placed in Manhattan. Not too big but very modern. 
Quite easy to join JFK airport using the metro , and easy to travel throughout different Manhattan best places, by walk or metro.
The employees are helping a lot ( many thanks to Kristie) , open mind and kind.
From the 3rd floor where our (standard ) bedroom was, the view was relaxed and pleasant, and from the rooftop , fantastic!

Our stay was in March, so I have no opinion on the roof top pool, except that this is a quite small swimming pool, but we are in NYC ! so this  pool is only to get a short refreshingly moment , not a place for kids to play :) ! 

 Breakfast is good and pleasant but a little too much expensive.
 I recommend this hotel

title: Wonderful Service
text: We had a great stay! The service staff was eager to help and the manager Thomas even walked down to the parking garage to help us with a miscommunication situation, which was extremely appreciated! We will be back.

title: Happy stay and excellent service
text: We stayed there for 3 nights and the service of the staff (Angela at front desk and Anthony FO manager) was excellent. Is is a boutique hotel amd excellent in many respects. However, it has a few glitches such as mediocre internet, malfunctioning elevators, clogged sink (seems a design issue) amd subpar house keeping. I am sure management will attend to these issues and we will be happily back

title: Great customer service
text:
Really helpful staff. They really go above and beyond. Shoutout to Angela and Melina, their manager Israel(?) as well. Love the vibe and the overall easy-going ambience. Will be back soon!

Thanks for everything!

title: Overall experience was good
text: The check in process was smooth and Angela working at the front desk was really friendly and helpful and attended to my needs. The only down side was that there was a private event the day I stayed on the second floor which lasted until late at night. I was on the third floor and I could hear the music.

title: Modernhaus
text: My stay at the Modernhaus was incredible. The staff was extremely hospitable and made sure to check in on me during my stay to ensure everything was at or above expectations.  The rooms have a killer view and are extremely clean. Would definitely recommend to anyone on the fence about booking Modernhause.

title: Mother daughter getaway
text: I just spent a 3 day getaway with my daughter at this hotel. This was our best experience in NYC by far beautiful hotel gorgeous rooms service and staff went above and beyond our expectations.  Angela Melina Evelin and Caitlin thank you for making our stay an amazing one . Will definitely be back here 😊💯

title: Wonderful Modern Experience
text:
