Did a quick 48 hours in NYC and stayed in Soho as it was closed to the Off Broadway show we came to see. 
MHS made this a wonderful weekend. Staff was very friendly, had a hiccup with our room and they were prompt in managing. They even offered an upgrade. Room was immaculate with breathtaking views. MHS is ideally located. In the midst of everything but tucked away so you’re not falling asleep to horns. Also close to the wonderful shopping on Broadway which may or may not be a good  thing if you’re an impulsive shopper like me. 

I was craving Spanish food and Caitlin at front desk provided multiple options all within walking distance. She provided info on atmosphere, wait and general crowd. All the info you need as a foodie deciding on a spot in the city. 

As we were checking out Angela and Melina were so kid. Offering us water as we waited for our Uber.

Do not hesitate in booking you stay at ModernHausSoho. Wonderful modern amenities with traditional hospitality

title: Modernhaus is NEXT LEVEL.
text: My wife and I stayed for her 30th birthday.  Room was the perfect size, clean as whistle, and view was great.  The staff had everything set up perfectly for me when we arrived (flowers, notes, etc).  All front desk staff wished my wife a happy birthday.  In the mornings we hung out (hungover) at Jumpin' Jacks on the second floor.  Great vibes, comfortable seating.  At night we partied with a really cool DJ on the roof with an INCREDIBLE VIEW.  Overall, 10/10 would recommend.

title: Very friendly staff
text: Das Hotel hat ein großartiges Design, die Zimmer haben eine angenehme Größe mit tollem Blick auf Manhattan. Das Team ist durchweg freundlich und zuvorkommend, Angela war liebenswert wie all ihre Kollegen. Immer ein freundlicher Chat. Die Gegend ist ein guter Ausgangspunkt und diverse U-Bahn-Linien nahbei. Dazu Nachbarschaftsläden, wie ein Weinladen ums Eck. Nicht zu vergessen die Aussicht von der Dachterasse.

title: Definitely will be back
text:
The hotel was beautiful, and everything was so clean. Upon arrival, I was greeted. By Kristy. She was incredible; she was so helpful and had a positive and professional demeanor. She gave tips on how to enjoy my stay at the hotel best and made me feel at home. I stayed in the King room on the 11th floor, and the view was unbelievable. The room included a couch and a small table. It was perfect. The bed and sheets were so soft and comfortable. The bathroom ammenities is by Le Labo. The rooftop was gorgeous. Next time I'm bringing my family.
Thank you Modernhaus, well done!!

title: The Best in SoHo,New York! for a  premium Boutique Hotel stay!!
text:
My Experience at the Modern Haus Soho was amazing! from the moment we walked in and were greeted at the door with help to bring in our bags. Everyone at the front desk and Doormen and the entire staff were so friendly and extremely helpful and knowledgeable about the the Hotel and local places to go.
This is a wonderful location to stay for many of New Yorks best places to eat and shop!
Modern Haus was  so accommodating to my Service pet and even sent up a pet bed and drinking bowl for her! 
I have stayed at many fine hotels in New York in the past , but , by far the Modern Haus is the Best, and I will return again soon!

title: Best Hotel Downtown NYC!
text: ModernHaus Soho is my home away from home when I’m in NYC. I wouldn’t think of staying anywhere else. The rooms are super comfortable. There are lots of choices of food and ambiences on site and all the people who work there are super nice and accommodating. They go out of their way to make sure that you’re having a pleasant stay and check in with you every evening to see if they can do anything for you. A big shout out to all of the people at the desk, including Kristy, Caitlin, Gisella, Angela, Melina and Evelin (best smile ever), the guys at the door, Eric, Jimmy, J and Michael, and of course Julio who never fails to produce a complimentary bottle of wine, the waiters and restaurant staff, all of the house people who bring you ice and anything else you need like Julian and others. And Anthony and Alejandro are super helpful managers. (Sorry to everyone I didn’t call out by name, I’m still trying to learn them all.) The gym is great as well and I can’t wait to visit in summer to use the rooftop pool. The hotel is convenient to walking all around Soho and when I stay, I bring my dog and it’s perfect for her as well. Let’s just say this hotel is big on treats for their guests and their furry friends! You just can’t go wrong staying at this hotel. Enjoy and thanks guys!

title: Our stay at Modernhaus
text: Our stay at Modernhaus was amazing. The staff were exceptional, friendly and genuine and always there to assist . The rooms were beautiful with great views out over Soho. The beds were extremely comfortable and the most comfortable beds we have ever slept in. Location to the subway, restaurants and attractions and shops too was very good. Would definitely recommend to anyone wanting to stay in Soho.

title: Excellent customer service, lovely hotel!
text: My husband and I took a short trip to NY for an event, and staying at ModernHaus turned out to be one of the best travel decisions ever. Our room was clean, comfortable, and modern, with luxurious bedding, a nice city view, and plenty of space for our things. I want to note in particular that the staff is absolutely lovely. Kenny and Jay helped us navigate our way to great meals and facilitated our return to the airport with ease, and made us feel welcome. Angela and Gisella kept in touch to ensure we had everything we needed for a comfortable stay and answered all our questions. Dining staff at Jumpin Jack's were equally wonderful and the food was fresh and delicious. This experience paired with a delightfully walkable Soho neighborhood means this hotel is a must for out of town travelers. I highly recommend! Customer service is unparallelled. Five stars!

title: Thanks to Staff
text: Hotel staff was very helpful, kind and smily face. Angela helped me a lot with my deliveries. She kept all my boxes safe and i find all (like 30 boxes) in my room after my check in. Special thanks again to Angela, Evelin, Caitlin, Brayden and Kristin

title: A Chic Urban Oasis.
text:
Intermingled against the backdrop of Soho's cast iron building architecture and cobblestone streets sits the ModernHaus SoHo, a meaningfully designed hotel integrated with the character of Soho. This property is strategically positioned around the corner from artist's lofts, art galleries, designer shops and more of the spirit of Soho. The Modern pays tribute to the neighborhood by showcasing numerous and extravagant artworks on it's premises.

I enjoyed my generously sized, nicely appointed Horizon weighing in at over 650 sq. ft. It featured a spacious sitting room, L-configured couch, mounted TV and 2 walls of floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking a vast panorama of Soho. The room was equipped with high-tech appliances like blinds that went up and down automatically. The bathroom was fitted with a walk-in rainfall shower, separate bath and all the accoutrements.

The Modern sports 3 dining options that cater to every taste and occasion. The principle restaurant, the Veranda, serves up a dining experience under the stars amid breathtaking views. This eatery boasts a modern American menu with super food inventions from the efforts of Michelin-starred chef George Mendes and his crew. For starters I  had some of the best sourdough bread I have tasted. A choice of mixed Chicken Confit was a tasty homerun. My sweet tooth was amply satisfied by the Strawberry & Rhubarb dessert concoction and my Pomegranate  Moscow Mule cocktail kicked like a mule. Jimmy's, a rooftop pool deck is a perfect place for handcrafted cocktails (seasonal) while Jumping Jacks acts as the hotels art-filled gathering hole. There is a modern gym equipped with Peleton bikes that were ideal for my exercise regime.

So, if you are looking for a hotel that  embraces the spirit of Soho as well as a museum full of artwork and Michelin caliber epicurean delights..............then try the .......................... ModernHaus  Soho.................A Chic Urban Oasis,

title: A reserver sans hésiter ! Quoi vous hésitez encore ?
text:
L’hôtel est parfait, dans le meilleur quartier mais surtout…le personnel est vraiment incroyable ! 
Ils prennent soins de vous du début à la fin. 
L’emplacement, le restaurant, la salle de sport, tout est top.
Les lits sont impeccables, pas de bruits.
Merci encore ! 
Merci Angela !

title: Modern & Elegant Property
text: Staying with Modernhaus SoHo gives you an elevated, modern, but warm feeling.  Walking inside and being greeted by Kenny Francis with a huge smile and big personality makes your day that much brighter.  The front of the house team was always accommodating and made sure our stay was nothing but perfect.  Highly recommend and will absolutely return to Modernhaus when visiting SoHo!

title: Incredible Birthday Trip!!!
text:
I went to NYC for my birthday, and stayed at ModernHaus. It was wonderful!!!! The location is great. I had a corner city view. The panoramic view was to die for. The pool is small but beautiful. The customer service is impecable. I want to mention Kristy. She is incredible with customers. Very personal, fun and super efficient, always going an extra mile. She made sure I got champagne on my birthday. Greeted me and then showed me and my husband their best suit. After we saw that we will definitely come back to try it. I work in retail so I never ask for extras, but she made us feel very special.
THANK YOU KRISTY, and everyone else that made a wonderful birthday stay.

title: Trendy & cute boutique hotel with attentive staff
text: The hotel has excellent location in the heart of Soho, kind and attentive staff, some more experienced than others but all with great intentions to assit.Nice place to stay for leisure or work with easy access to everything in the lower part of Manhattan and not far from metro.  Angel and Kristy at reception were particularly patient and helpful.

title: A cool Hotel in Soho…
text:
I spent two nights here and it’s perfectly located for all of Soho. The room I had, on the 6th floor, was dual aspect so lots of light. I appreciated the Nespresso machine on the room. The staff were especially helpful…Kristy on check in and  Caitlin on check out. 
The Verandah bar is good and Jimmy’s is a must for a sundowner.

title: A Very Happy Guest
text: I’ve stayed at numerous 4/5 star hotels in the Soho area and I must say this one is by far my favorite. Aside from the lovely room (which is quite spacious for an NYC hotel room) and amenities, the service here is top notch! Kristy and her team were amazing and always available via text for whatever we needed during our stay. She went above and beyond to ensure our comfort and convenience and as a result I will definitely be choosing ModernHaus again on my next visit to NYC. Thank you Kristy and team and Modernhaus!

title: Perfect stay
text: If you are looking for a cozy, comfortable and luxury stay, Modern Haus Hotl will be a perfect choice. Many thanks for whole staff specially Angelina and Christie. They were so friendly and helpful. <3

title: Brilliant gem
text: Stayed for a week for work and the staff made my staff perfect! It begins with Kenny at the door who is very helpful, knowledgeable and a quick wit! Kristy at the desk is a refreshing soul! The variety of food and spaces to imbibe, including the roof, met my highest expectations. And let’s not forget housekeeping. So courteous and thoughtful!

title: Loved it here. Perfect stay, helpful staff, fantastic location.
text: 10/10 I loved the attentiveness of the staff. The rooms are really nice. The location is exactly where you need to be in soho. Near the train and within walking distance to everything. Angela and Kristy were very helpful, among every other staff member there. The restaurant dining and bars in the hotel are a wonderful touch. Rooftop is beautiful too.

title: Great views, location, and lovely staff
text:
The front desk and the team are so lovely. When we first checked in Kristy & Angela helped us out and got us a room with a gorgeous view. They helped us with our dog Winston and got us a dog bed, bowls, and made sure he was settled. 

It was also super convenient to just text the front desk whenever we needed help. 

I came here on a work trip and brought my wife and dog, we’ll for sure be coming back

title: Great hotel / Great staff
text: I enjoyed my visit.  The staff was very courteous and professional.  Every touch point was excellent from the doorman to the concierge to the bellman.  It was a great experience.  Thank you for taking such care of me and my wife.

title: The best stay in New York
text: We are very happy to have visited this wonderful hotel, and we are very grateful for the excellent service we received from Alejandro, he really made our stay there very pleasant. For sure we will come back

title: Fantastic Stay!
text: We usually stay in Time Square, but this is our new spot. The hotel was comfortable, clean, and accommodating. Kristy was the perfect example of what every hotel should hire. Kristy was very helpful and went way and above for my husband and me. If we needed help, she took it to the next level. This hotel was close to everything and the deli next door was fantastic for fresh juice and food. Thank you, Kristy.

title: Great Experience. Highly recommended.
text: This was our first time staying at ModernHaus Soho, and it was a delight from beginning to end. We had a very early flight and they let us check in at 8:30 in the morning which was perfect because we were exhausted. They gave us an upgraded corner room, which was beautiful, it was much larger than rooms we typically get in New York City-beautifully appointed and very thoughtful touches everywhere. Very comfortable bed and wonderful shower. We had a great breakfast at the hotel restaurant and took advantage of their free cocktail coupons and had a lovely evening at the bar. The staff was incredibly friendly and helpful. I accidentally left something in the hotel safe and they mailed it to me at no charge. The subway is right outside the door so all of our connections while we were in the city were super convenient we will definitely stay here the next time we come highly recommended!

title: Best Customer Service!
text: I stayed at ModernHaus SoHo with my boss for a work trip, and it was the BEST experience. Special shoutout to Kristy and Alejandro! They both really made our stay special, and we are so grateful for the amazing experience they gave us. Everyone at the hotel was kind and friendly, and the room was GORGEOUS. Thank you all so much! Definitely book a trip here!

title: Great vibes good location!
text: This hotel was amazing! Evelin and Kenny were so accommodating from the moment we walked in. Friendly and good vibes throughout the stay.  Got in a few hours before check in time and they helped make sure we would get a room ASAP. We went to the restaurant on second floor and there coffee was delicious! Great location. Will def come back

title: Mr
text: Modernhaus Soho was comfortable and the service was excellent. Angela went out of her way to make us feel welcome. The location is walking distance to several nice restaurants. The views of lower Manhattan are dope; would  definitely visit again.

title: Excellent stay!!
text: I would definitely go back! Caitlyn at the front desk was wonderful and made sure our stay was top notch! The services, amenities and overall stay was amazing!! Definitely will go back! Recommend to anyone who wants a romantic getaway

title: Amazing hotel!!!
text: I had a 5 star experience at the Modernhaus Soho! We had to add on a night and Kristy at the front desk was SO helpful and accomodating! She managed to keep us in the same room and when she found out it was my birthday had a bottle of champagne delivered!  The rooms were clean, spacious and quiet! It's located in a great location and easy walking distance from everything! All the staff were so helpful and friendly (shoutout again to Kristy, Angela and Eric)! Would absolutely stay here again in the future!!!

title: Buon hotel à Manhattan
text: Buon hotel ottimamente posizionato nel cuore di Soho. Personale molto gentile, e servizievole, camera spaziosa con ottima vista. É solo un po lontano a piedi dal centro di Manhattan, ma la metro non é distante.

title: Great NY stay
text: Really enjoyed the Modern Haus. Rooms are fresh and bright. Breakfast was excellent and the team who run the hotel went above and beyond. A special shout out to Eric who was really helpful and organised us a car to the airport at the same rate as a taxi. Loved being in soho and if soho is where you wish to stay Modern Haus is a great choice.

title: Rude Staff; Repeatedly call my room (5 times!) when I was on an important business call to kick me out of the room
text: Wasn't even my checkout time yet but they called me repeatedly 5 times; disrupting my important business call. When I mentioned to the front desk, they did not even apologize. Made up some stupid excuse about their system error! I will never ever stay at this hotel again, never, over my dead body. When I asked the staff why the points did not show up, they said cause I booked through my company's travel agency and not directly with them. Hello? That's how ALL business travelers book their trip! I wish I had stay with Marriott or Hilton. They would have treated me better. Worst mistake ever! These people don't care about guests, don't own up to their mistakes but instead blame and gaslight you!

title: Amazing location
text:
The location its great, the rooms are well kept, friendly staff, several options for eating.
Perfect for walking around and do some shopping. 
Nice roof top bar, the rooms has bottled water and good selection of coffee

title: Awesome hotel!
text: Amazing Penthouse! My company got me this room and everyone and everything was so lovely. The room block for our group was handled so well and Maria and the team was just terrific. Thanks to Angela at the front desk for checking me in.

title: ModernHaus is my new go to hotel in NYC
text: My stay at Modernhaus was top notch in every way. The service was amazing (Evelin made sure I was happy throughout my stay) My room was neat and well maintained. They have Nespresso machines in the room and the room service was quick and delicious. They have Le Labo products in the bathroom, which are my absolute favorite ! Plus a great restaurant on site and amazing rooftop bar and pool.

title: Best Front Desk Service - Business Travel
text:
I just stayed at the Modernhaus Soho for business and had a great experience.  I arrived later in the evening and was greeted by Eric the Bellman and escorted to the front desk where I met Kristy. Kristy was super welcoming, helped find my rewards number, told me all about the places to eat on property and about the menus.  She also texted me when I got to my room to see if it was to my liking and if I needed any additional amenities.  5 Star service. 

I dined at the hotel restaurant Veranda per Kristy's recommendation and had great service and wonderful food at the bar.

  I would go back just because of the front area experience.

title: Great location
text: On the edge of Soho, this hotel offers amazing views of the Freedom Tower and lower Manhattan. The facilities are very attractive (restaurant and rooftop bar.) There are plenty of options of meals and shopping in the area. A bonus is the Le Labo toiletries in the bathroom!

title: Amazing front desk team and staff
text:
The front desk staff are exceptional! 

Kristy is an amazing member of staff - very pro-active with offering advice and guidance - really knows her restaurant recommendations too!! Very very helpful and friendly - at all times! 

The hotel is situated perfectly between the FiDi , Soho and Midtown area - so much within walking distance - very convenient subway locations close by as well.  Shops (higher-end), restaurants, bars…. It’s all right there! 

Fully recommend this hotel for new visitors to New York or return visitors looking for a well balanced location and great hotel.

title: Quintessential New York stay...
text: Kristy is AWESOME!!! She made this country Kansas girl New York experience phenomenal!!! There are no words to explain the hospitality, kindness and attention to detail... plus the hotel is quintessential "New Yorky" and chic... The rooftop bar is vibrant and dinner in a yort at the Veranda Restaurant... amazing!!! THANK YOU for an amazing stay!!!

title: TRUST THE REVIEWS & BOOK YOUR STAY HERE: LARGE ROOMS, FRIENDLY TEAM, BEST LOCATION, SEXY AF!!!
text:
A friend and I came to NYC from Chicago for 2 days to see the Thierry Mugler/Virgil Abloh exhibits at the Brooklyn Museum. Lower Manhattan is my favorite area so I conducted an intensive search to discover where Quality of —Accommodations, —Experience, —Neighborhood, Size of Room, & Price intersected to create the best experience with the greatest value. All arrows pointed to ModernHaus Soho. In fact, I learned about MHS from an article in Architectural Digest and compared/contrasted with similar properties…the large size of the rooms and rave reviews are what won me over. 

I came in with high expectations but what I didn’t expect was warm, friendly service and an exceptional restaurant. True to the reviews, MHS is located in the heart of Hipster Heaven featuring endless shopping and culinary options but more importantly, it’s situated next door to a 24 hr Boar’s Head deli/convenience store that supplies of your needs and across the street from a well-rated coffee shop.  

The clean, contemporary rooms, featuring floor to ceiling windows and Le Labo Santal 33 products, are LARGE by NYC standards. The King Studio w/ View was 380sq ft compared to the average of 150-200sq ft for a similar room at hotels of the same caliber yet pricing was the same. 

Hotel guests are treated to drink tickets at one of their 2 bars. I highly suggest redeeming yours at their fine dining restaurant Veranda. The lighting is epic, the decor is sumptuous, the drinks are lavish, and the bartenders are engaging. 

The front desk team and bellmen were outstanding! They were accommodating to our request for a higher floor, kept our bags for hours after our checkout, made fantastic recommendations and were super friendly. Brayden suggested we go to nearby lounge Butterfly at SixtySoho for a nightcap and we had a quintessential NY experience! He perfectly paired our vibe and requests with a place that exceeded our expectations. Along with Chris & Kristi and bellmen Jay & Eric, Brayden created a fun, seamless and elevated experience for us.

I would definitely recommend the ModernHaus Soho and stay here again!

title: Great Stay!
text: A nice chic hotel, ideally located in New York City! Well- appointed rooms with comfy bed and heated bathroom floor! Staff was professional and accommodating as well- It wasn't just a great stay but also a great experience! Will definitely book again-

title: Kristy is the BEST
text:
Kristy was nothing short of AMAZING! First time in NYC for my boyfriends bday and our anniversary. She told me where to find parking and also helped me chose the best room. She went ABOVE AND BEYOND and offered me the best view in the hotel (thankfully it was available). 

When you call or book a stay make sure to talk to Kristy. Her helpful genuine personality is what the hospitality industry needs!! Thank you again Kristy, we WILL be back!!!!!

title: Just Outstanding Service
text:
We came to NYC to get married on New Years Eve, and so we were looking for the perfect place to stay and, after much deliberation, we chose the Modernhaus, and boy did we get it right. Having emailed ahead to explain our plan, we were dealt with personally by Anthony Roussel who couldn't do enough for us - he helped with flowers in the room, the best dry cleaners to use, lovely touches in the room, and plenty more. It was just perfect, and he was a diamond. 

That's not to say that the rest of the staff weren't lovely - they were - from a great welcome, to superb housekeeping, to being endlessly helpful, and going above and beyond, especially when we checked out. And the guys on the door could not have been more helpful and friendly. 

The hotel has a "cool" vibe, but that doesn't overwhelm the place, and you could easily stay there and NOT be a hipster (we certainly did!) - the views from the rooms are stunning, and the neighbourhood is really pleasant - a touch local, a touch cool. Really good balance. 

Thanks to all, we'll be back for sure, and we'll never forget what you did for us on our special trip. Dave and Amanda

title: Soho Gem
text: Fantastic spot in the heart of Soho.  Outstanding service and exceptionally welcoming and friendly staff.  I have stayed in other hotels in the area and this place has them all beat.  Not a single negative thing to say.  Will be back for sure.

title: Fantastic experience
text:
Me and my girlfriend stayed in the hotel for 13 nights. I am so grateful that we chose ModernHaus Soho:
Perfect location , large room and fantastic service. 
Special comment for Angela who was incredibly professional and nice , amazing!!! 
We also stayed here for the New year’s eve party at the terrace. We Had a lot of fun.

title: Perfect stay with nice & friendly staff
text: Amazing hotel!!! We had a wonderful stay. The customer service and the staff is really excellent. It made our stay definetly perfect. The corner room is lovely we didn’t want to leave it. A special thanks to Angela, Eric & Kristy they pay attention to details and are absolutly pleasant. If we come back we will of course choose this great hotel. 😁

title: Sejour Magique à Modernhaus Soho
text:
Nous avons passé une semaine dans cet établissement, en passant par les réceptionnistes, les bagagistes, serveurs, femmes de menage ont été d’un accueil et d’une gentillesse exceptionnelle.
Toujours une petite attention dans nos chambres, lorsqu ils ont su que j’avais fait une demande en mariage, ils ont pris l’initiative de mettre des roses sur notre lit, avec bouteille de champagne ainsi que des fraises au chocolat car ma femme est enceinte❤️ 
Les chambres sont parfaitement équipées, machines à café, vue incroyable, ect..

L’emplacement est idéal, proche de la rue principale de Soho, broadway et de tout ses commerces et grandes marques de luxe
Bien loin de l atmosphère bruyant et touristique de time square.
Metro au pied de l’hotel

Seul petit point négatif, le manque de rangement dans les chambres. 
Je n’hesiterai pas à revenir dans cet hôtel pour mon prochain déplacement 
Encore merci à tout l’equipe de Modernhaus Soho. 

Speciale dédicace à Evelin❤️

title: Best Hotel in Beautiful Soho
text: We had a really Great Time! The Hotel is absolut Beautiful and everyone there was super nice, especially Angelina! She was super funny and made sure everything was perfect for us! We will definitally come back! Loved it

title: Amazing stay and staff
text: I went to visit soho with my fiancé and stayed at this lovely hotel. It was a wonderful experience . The staffs are so friendly And amazing especially Angela at the front desk. She was super sweet and really made the trip worth and gave us idea where to visit since it’s our first time in New York. I would definitely recommend this hotel especially for the wonderful staff their costumer service.

title: Wedding night surprise
text: We booked a small room to crash in after our civil marriage ceremony in Manhattan. Hotel staff were very friendly, tried their best to get us an early check in and just dropped our bags in our room before running off to get married. We returned to the hotel after a night out to find that they had moved our bags to the penthouse suite and had a bottle of bubbly waiting for us! This was the most spectacular room either of had ever stayed in, truly stunning and what an incredible surprise for our wedding night. The staff went above and beyond and a special thanks to Thomas!

title: 10/10 would recommend
text:
Amazing stay-welcoming staff, Eric, Brayden and Kenny were so accommodating with any requests. Super comfortable bed, very clean rooms and the common areas were always beautiful.
Fantastic area to stay at; close to everything and I loved that it was a little out of the crazy that is NYC. 
Rooftop bar was fabulous too!
Would stay here again in a heartbeat.

title: Nous y retournerons à coup sûr !
text: Une expérience remarquable. Brayden s’est occupé de nous durant notre séjour de 10 jours ainsi que le reste de son équipe. Toute l’équipe est adorable et toujours au petit soin avec pleins d’attentions. La vue de la chambre est extraordinaire. Le restaurant et le rooftop apporte aussi un plus car très bon, très beau et sur place. L’emplacement est idéal avec deux lignes de métros en bas de l’hôtel. Point supplémentaire pour le petit déjeuner qui était délicieux quelques soit les plats ! Bravo au chef ! Nous y retournerons avec plaisir !

title: Fantastic hotel!
text: Just a perfect place to stay in NYC, perfectly located in Soho. Lovely room, great guest services, delightful people! Big shout out to Eric who could not have been more helpful in organising our airport car. THANK YIU!

title: Relax, Party or Lounge in style!!!
text: This hotel surpassed my expectations. The area is wonderfully located in Soho. Great for shopping, dining and partying. The hotel itself has an amazing restaurant, a charming lounge, and an awesome rooftop bar. I loved ordering breakfast, lunch and dinner to my room. The room service waiters are so down to earth and knowledgeable about the location. My room was always cleaned in the evening and the sweet treats at the lobby for the holiday made all the difference. My go to hotel for when I want to travel to NY.  Thank You ModernHaus.

title: December 19th stay in NYC
text: Wonderful Hotel in our favorite part of NYC. Soho. Fantastic service. Staff is attentive, responsive and just laid back enough that you cant believe you are in a hotel. Felt like we were at our friends house. Rooms are appointed with luxurious bedding, Nespresso coffee, and sound proof windows that open enough to breathe in fresh air. Just a great touch! Couldnt ask for a better NY holiday experience.

title: Great location, great manager, but not the best value for money
text:
Pros:
- the manager really cares and want to make you enjoy your stay
- depends on who is in the front desk, but some of them really want to help you
- bigger room compares to hotels in the same area.
- location is great

Cons:
- I don't think it is value for money
- you can hear anything going on outside of you room, which can be a problem
- the room is very dark

Will I stay here again? For business trips- yes, it is better than other places in the area.
For a vacation- no, as I don't think it is value for money.

title: Great SoHo Experience!
text:
Super cute hotel in a quiet(er) part of Manhattan, conveniently located near a subway station that gives you access to a ton of the city. 

The room was decent-sized with a great city view and the heated floor in the bathroom came in clutch with the temps outside barely above 30. 

Kristy was fantastic and made our trip memorable every time we walked into the building, going above and beyond to make sure my wife and I got to see the rooftop bar even though there was a private event that evening.

title: Romantic Trip to the city !
text:
It was our first stay at the hotel ! We loved the staff especially Brayden and Caitlin and Evelin and of course Michael who is the first person you see when you pull up - he greeted us with a smile ! The staff was very helpful and has great personalities! Our room
Was cozy yet had the best view of the sky line - I’ve seen in awhile and we frequently stay over in the city ! We can’t wait to return ! We ate the hotel and everything was delicious! We ate lunch and breakfast! Even the room service was great ! We definitely will be returning hopefully in the summer so we can use the roof top
Pool !

title: Amazing sensitive attitude from staff
text: This is not the usual review..but I wanted to express my deepest gratitude for this hotel and its staff members. When I have arrived at the hotel on Dec 30 2022, I got the message that my father has suddenly passed away, a short time after I checked-in. The receptionist Kristy was so kind, and also texted me later on to pay her condolences. Furthermore, the hotel was so kind to cancel the booking without any fees. I am positive that I will be back again in NYC, and will make sure to book this hotel again. Thank you!

title: ModernHaus FTW!
text:
Staying here made me feel I was “in the know” in SoHo. Entrance from the street is speakeasy-esque with no obvious signage, just the address. 
The staff always - and I mean ALWAYS - greeted us with a smile and hello. Indeed, all the staff at every level were awesome. 
Our room was a good size for Manhattan- and thoughtfully appointed. We could both comfortably lounge while taking a break, the bed was a dream (literally!), and the shower divine. 
We had a corner room on a lower floor, and yet still had a terrific view … AND it was QUIET …

Would recommend this place without hesitation.

title: Nice hotel
text:
I stayed at modernhaus soho for two nights and the hotel rooms were spacious and clean. The amenities and rooftop bar was great fun especially on Saturday with the DJ!
The front desk staff were helpful and friendly especially Braydon who recommended us to try the best tasting pizza we’ve ever had! Overall we had a great time 5/5.

title: What a stay!!
text:
I arrived late on a Sunday night and my stay from start to finish was truly exceptional. Whether it was the ale Labo bath products, the brilliant Jimmys bar, or moreover the incredible staff the stay was top notch. 
I’d especially like to call out Kristy, who could not have more helpful. She found subway connections, shopping and food recommendations and gave us brilliant NYC information. 
I’d love to thank all the staff there for a great time, we really enjoyed it and would choose to come back at the drop of a hat. 
Thank you ModernHaus for a wonderful NYC stay

title: My experience was wonderful thanks to Kristy.
text: I had the pleasure of speaking with Kristy at the front desk desk today. She was so pleasant and help, I will be booking in the future. I visit NY often and definitely look forward to stay at this hotel in the future.

title: Perfect one-night birthday stay!
text:
First and foremost, I would like to thank the wonderful crew that helped make our stay ideal. Kristy, Julio and Eric went above and beyond, making the entire experience memorable. It was my fiancée's 30th birthday, and I was probably (definitely) pretty annoying with how much I called and checked in to make sure everything went well. Even stopping in the day before was probably a bit much, but they were very nice about it 😂! We really appreciate Kristy for the great communication as well as making sure we got everything we requested and much more. The fruit tray, champagne, and personalized card were also amazing birthday gifts from the crew, so thanks again for that! The room itself and the views were perfect in a great location in SoHo. We actually saw Olympian Shaun White at a restaurant around the corner that evening.  

It was an extremely hectic/tough month of September, so this was our chance to get away for a bit in the city and finally celebrate our recent engagement and the birthday. With that being said, the hotel staff's help and kindness meant a lot more to us than they even realized. 

Thanks again, and we are definitely looking forward to staying again at some point!

title: Did not stay- they were very misleading on website - the 3rd night free is very very misleading and not right!
text:
There sure had a rate of 470 for a king - over the dates I was looking - and they had a promotion where you get the 3rd night free…. But after I booked- I noticed that the 3rd night wasn’t free that the 470 was charged for 3 night! So in contacted the hotel to ask them to adjust they sent me back an email with adjustment - and basically it was the same price they just charged like 700 a night - made adjustments to where it appetites that the 3rd night was free!! This is very u derhanded and not above board so I would suggest that nobody choose this hotel!! Who knows what kind of fees they will also pile on your reservation!! 
SHADY!!!

title: Superbe séjour à Soho !
text:
Superbe expérience au Modernhaus Soho début novembre 2022 ! Chambre d’angle (studio skyline view) très grande et très lumineuse avec très belle vue sur la freedom tower / personnel top / nous avons eu un souci le premier jour avec les bagages qui a été très vite réglé par la manager Kristy qui nous a offert en dédommagement une bouteille de champagne en chambre et a ensuite veillé tout le long du séjour à ce que tout se passe bien ! Petit déjeuner excellent, dîner dans les yourtes au restaurant Véranda absolument exceptionnel, nous reviendrons !

Point à noter : les chambres ont une belle vue mais donnent sur des axes passants - c’est bruyant comme la majorité des hôtels de New York

title: A wonderfully warm and vibey hotel.
text: This hotel has a wonderful vibe to it-service was outstanding and the sunset on the rooftop each night was a highlight! Bed was so comfortable and cosy-definitley will stay again when in NYC! Close to great Soho cafés and restaurants.Will return!

title: Could not be more perfect!
text: You guys, we booked our stay here for our anniversary. And, when we got to the hotel, they said they bumped us to the suite on the very top floor and gave us free drink cards for Veranda (their gorgeous restaurant)! It was absolutely beautiful. We walked in the room, and there was a card, macaroons, and a personal note. We were ecstatic! It could not have been a more incredible stay. Kristy helped us so much with all of our needs, and gave us several suggestions for touring new York, And, Caitlin was so kind and helpful with all of our questions. We absolutely loved everything about our stay here, and it's definitely going to be our go-to for staying in new york!

title: Fantastic stay!
text: I recently spent several nights at ModernHaus SoHo with my mini goldendoodle and I truly cannot say enough complimentary things about the property, location, and staff. Everyone working at the hotel was kind, professional, and went above and beyond to make both my dog and I feel valued and welcome. Kristy Maynard, in particular, went out of her way to ensure that our needs were not only met, but far exceeded. Upon checkin, Kristy made sure we had a dog bed, bowls, and anything else that would ensure we had a comfortable stay (including lots of dog treats and snuggles for the pup!). The property itself was very clean, modern, had fantastic art on display, and was in the perfect location for us to wander SoHo and to further explore the West Village, Greenwich Village, Chelsea, LES, TriBeCa, and Battery Park.  It was easy enough to pop up to MOMA to take in some art and over to Al Hirschfeld to catch a matinée, but nice to return to a much quieter, cleaner part of the city afterwards. I didn't get a chance to enjoy the restaurants on property (too many old favorites to visit elsewhere), but they looked and smelled incredible. Will definitely dine on site in future. So looking forward to our next stay - highly recommend visiting the hotel yourself!

title: We will be bak!
text: We have been to NYC many times, this was by FAR our best hotel experience! Room had a spectacular view and very spacious. The food and staff were exceptional! And to top it off, the team down at the concierge desk went out of their way to proactively check on us to see if we had any needs. Very impressive, we will certainly be back!

title: Fab Hotel in a great location. Perfect for a city break
text: The hotel and service were fantastic. I can't single out a particular member of staff as everyone was friendly and helpful. Loved the hotel, the rooftop bar and the gym and we will definitely be staying at Modernhaus again in the future.

title: The perfect city getaway
text: The staff were all extremely sweet and the room was divine!! Went for a night to celebrate my husbands birthday and do some activities in the area and was blown away!! The room was beautiful with breathtaking views of the city, everything was clean and it all felt very high end and luxurious. The shower has AMAZING water pressure, which is something that is very important to us. Caitlin was honestly a godsend from the minute we checked in to the moment we checked out. She was so helpful and patient with any questions I/we had. She was able to secure us a last minute brunch reservation before we left which was so accommodating and appreciated. While checking out we also met Gisella who was so sweet and offered us mimosas and luggage storage while we went to out brunch reservation. We loved the hotel stay and room so much we didn’t want to leave. We already live in NY but wanted a little getaway for the night to avoid driving back home late and it honestly exceeded all our expectations, we would love to revisit sometime!!

title: Celebrating a special occasion
text: I highly recommend ModernHaus Soho. It is a well designed, beautifully curated hotel at a great location and offering wonderful hospitality.  The staff was very obliging, friendly and extremely helpful and considerate. Kristy and Caitlin were particularly kind, and made our stay very special.

title: 100% best hotel in SoHo
text: Best hospitality you’ll get in New York. I’ve stayed at a few rooms in this hotel and the views from every floor are unlike any other I’ve been to in SoHo. So nice that they have a beautiful restaurant and rooftop bar attached that don’t feel like a classic “hotel restaurant” and both I would visit even if I wasn’t staying there. The beds are insanely comfortable which I never pay that much attention to but it’s clear they put a ton of effort into the renovation and it really elevates the hotel beyond the other spots in SoHo/NoHo/TriBeCa. I like that the hotel isn’t just a “cool kid” downtown vibe, but somewhere I’d have my parents stay or anyone on a work trip, even though it definitely has an effortless trendy vibe which I love. 100% would recommend.

title: Great location - great hotel - great staff!
text: I can't say enough about our experience at ModernHaus Soho. We were throwing a 40th bday party at the Jimmy Rooftop for our friend and so we were encouraged to book with Modernhaus given the convenience - I'm so glad we did! The grounds are so marvelous and a total hidden gem in NYC. The restaurant (Jumpin' Jacks) was a great little meeting place for the guests as an in-between meet up spot with amazing staff - all were so friendly! The entire hotel is so beautifully and tastefully decorated and chic. The icing on the cake was the bottle of champagne delivered to my room for my birthday as well as the daily texts checking in to see how our stay was. The rooms were so comfortable, beautiful, well-lit, and the bath products heavenly! We thoroughly enjoyed our time at MSoho and look forward to coming back - one of the best hotel experiences I've ever had!

title: To celbrate my partner's important birthday.
text:
What a lovely venue! Beautifully designed and curated. Great art in the lobbies and rooms.
The staff was very friendly and always willing to help.
Particularly Kristy and Caitlin.

We had a room with an incredible view of the City--great sunsets AND sun rises, even dramatic moon rises!

This lovely boutique hotel gave us a completely unique view of our city.

We's highly recommend it!!

title: Bliss
text: Second time staying.   Highly reccomend 11th FL.  If you are too high then you hear noise from nightclub until 2A.  View was amazing, room small, clean but totally functional.   Staff was very friendly and helpful

title: Great hotel on a great Location
text: First time staying in Soho, and definitely was a great choice. Shops are walking distance, but the area is quiet to rest after walk so many miles every day !!.   Everyone very polite and helpful . Checkout team (Specially Evelin & Anthony), went the extra mile for us. Thanks !!

title: Wonderful Stay at ModernHaus!
text: We had a wonderful stay at Modern Haus for three nights. We loved the Soho location and the views from the spectacular terrace. Best views I had ever seen from a downtown hotel and the perfect place to watch the sunset. The room was beautiful and had great design. Also-quite spacious! The bed was just superb. I recommend this hotel to anyone wanting to be in Soho.

title: THE customer service
text: This hotel’s hospitality is above and beyond. I would like to mention Kristy at front desk, and guest services. She exceeded any and all expectations that I’ve ever experienced. She went out of her way to help us locate restaurants, directions, event details. We were able to communicate with her any time needed! Definitely coming back here!

title: Overpriced for what it is
text:
This isn't a bad hotel - it can just be very pricey for what it is.  I was staying there during Fashion Week, which means that a lot of downtown hotels were particularly full - but also means that, with taxes and fees, my very very basic hotel room was close to $800/night.  

Size-wise, it's about average for NYC (i.e., tiny) - about the exact same size and layout as a standard room at the Public Hotel (where I usually stay), under 300 square feet but well laid out.  The bed and pillows are comfortable, the shower is decent, and the blackout curtains are very effective.  Rooms are clean and well-maintained, and maid service is quick and effective.  The location is good, too, on the southern edge of Soho near Tribeca.

It is also near the entrance to the Holland Tunnel, which is the problem - that location means that you get a constant symphony of horns 24/7.  I was on the 3d floor, and I'm guessing the traffic noise was less obtrusive on higher floors.  However, when I was in the lobby waiting for an Uber my last day, two guests came down to the front desk complaining that the noise from the rooftop bar made it impossible for them to sleep (the front desk ended up moving them to a lower floor).  So it seems like noise presents a no-win situation - lower floors get you noise from the Holland Tunnel, upper floors get you noise from the bar.  

I would say the noise from other rooms and the hallway were very minimal, and that a certain amount of street noise is common in NYC hotels.  But the Public Hotel and the Bowery Hotel, for example, tend to be quieter, and for $800/night I'd expect the most extreme noiseproofing possible.  So I probably won't be coming back here, unless I can get a much better rate (and bring good earplugs).

title: just right!
text: first time here, booked nine days for both work and pleasure. caitlin at the front desk got us off to a marvelous start with her attentive service and care for getting us the room we were hoping for. we had positive interactions with every staff member-doorman, housekeeping, restaurant. the small size of the hotel makes it cozy and calm and a welcoming environment to come back to after a long day.

title: Excellent séjour. Très bon accueil et aide
text:
Nous avons été très bien accueillis avec beaucoup d'attentions et même aidés par toute l'équipe de la réception (Kenny, Kristy, Evelin...) pour essayer de récupérer notre bagage perdu (appels aéroport) et ils nous ont même dépannés d'un nécessaire de toilette et prise USB. Un grand merci pour votre accueil. Le "doorman" Eric, souriant et si élégant, nous a donné beaucoup de bonnes adresses avec beaucoup de gentillesse. Merci à lui !
Le meilleur hôtel de notre séjour à NY !

title: Pool  Service!
text: Yesterday we came by to see some friends & they showed us the pool area. Literally the moment we walked towards the pool we were welcomed by Maurice the Lifeguard with water & towels. Sadly we had to decline the towels but he still let us know “No, worries I’ll have some for you tomorrow” & directed us where the best pictures could be taken. Above & beyond!

title: Excellent service, great rooms, superb view from cool pool
text:
We spent my birthday weekend this summer at ModernHaus, where we've been for years when it was The James. The staff, especially Maxwell at the pool, was extraordinary. That guy did not sit for one minute, refilling my water glass -- poolside!-- before it ever got empty. 

We ended up meeting a lot of lovely people at the pool, where we spent much of our time. (Yes, I know it's Manhattan, but it was very hot and we just loved the views.) The food was also very good. 

At night the pool area turns into a nightclub, which is not our speed, so that was a perfect opportunity to go see theater, go out for dinner, and just walk around Soho and the surrounding interesting neighborhoods. Note: Even with a nightclub, we were not bothered by noise at night, and we were pretty near it. 

Can't wait to come back next year. Hope Maxwell is there!

title: Bruit d’ascenseur
text:
L’hotel est bien placé c’est tout. Chambres petites.
Enorme bruit d’ascenseur très dérangeant. Certes l’ascenseur est rapide mais vous avez l’impression de dormir au dessus d’un metro ou sous une gare.
A la reception on nous a proposé des ‘earplugs’.
Par la suite le manager a au debut reconnu un problème d’ascenseur qui allait être révisé le soir même. 
Mais rien n’a changé.
Franchement rapport qualité-prix tres mauvais.

title: We loved it!!
text:
Kathi and I had an excellent time at ModernHaus Soho recently. It was the perfect location to hub out for all of our NYC adventures! Which included; Basquiat, Banksy, RATM/RTJ at The Garden, Drag Queens, Restaurant Week, more Drag Queens, and Brooklyn!

From the moment we came through the door to check in, to rolling our luggage out, our experience could not have been better. Kristi and staff (especially Eric the bellman and Caitlin) were always ready with a warm, sincere greeting, a recommendation, a friendly chat, or to help with an odd request.  Like when we came back from Caputo’s in Brooklyn with lard bread, holding it in the freezer for a couple days was not an issue.

The staff in Jumpin’ Jacks made a tasty coffee, and poured a great glass of rosé. Back Bar was a beautiful outdoor space for an afternoon wine as well. The rooftop pool was fun for a drink and to people watch on a Sunday.

And our room, our room!  Well laid out, a comfy bed, nice bath amenities, and that view!!  The housekeeping staff kept it neat and clean as well.

We definitely recommend ModernHaus and you can bet we’ll be staying with you on our next trip to the city!!

We look forward to seeing you in the future!

title: Modernhaus
text:
We have a great time at the hotel! The crew was so kind, especially Maurice, the pool guard men that is more than that..so nice and helpfulness, make care about the little things.
The hotel also is located in a great place, near soho’s heart!

title: Hotel nice but do not plan on using pool
text: Hotel is great but unless you’re under 30 do not plan on using the pool on weekends or the rooftop bar. The pool closes for pool parties that are for the folks in their 20s. Jimmy’s rooftop is ALL 20s. But you will pay the hotel resort fee regardless.

title: 5 star experience
text: Modernhaus Soho completely exceeded our expectations. My fiancé and I booked this hotel last minute for our wedding weekend. We live in the area and know a lot of nyc hotels can be quite small, so we’re a bit hesistant at first. Kristy helped check us in and graciously upgraded our room. The room was beautiful, large, and had insane views of the city. Kristy even went as far as texting us to make sure we were comfortable and sent a bottle of champagne and dessert to the room. Their customer service was like none I’ve ever seen.  The hotel is very modern, has a great resteraunt attached, and all around awesome place to stay if you are visiting. We’ll be back!

title: This review is strictly about the rooftop pool area!
text:
I'm currently staying at Modernhaus Soho for the week and had the best experience
at the pool!
Not only is it absolutely breathtaking- almost 360 views aside from the blocked view from the lounge/bar area (you can still see the Empire State building through the glass in the back!) Maurice was extremely attentive. Right when I arrived he pointed me to the towels and brought over water. He even re-filled my water as I was applying sunscreen (they have a complimetary  supergoop sunscreen tray out for guests). I felt so taken care of! Thank you again Maurice!

title: A WONDERFUL EXPERIENCE
text: My wife & I went using a day pass & Lifeguard Maurice took amazing care of us the whole time. He set a standard for the whole vibe of the short stay. He went out of his way to tell us some of the venues for the night life in the area. THANK YOU MAURICE

title: Never been disappointed!!
text: Every time I come to NY, with no doubt I choose Modernhaus SoHo hotel. Many factors convinced me to choose this hotel. Comfort, kind staffs, spacious room, modern deco with a taste of Calder, it’s Rooftop with a breathtaking view of NYC, doorman always there to help, amenities by Le Labo, and at last not the least an incredibly comfortable bed. They provided me with everything a traveler could wish for during the stay. I will recommend 100%

title: Outdoor Space Galore
text:
Checked in last night and staying for a few nights. Exceptional service, literally ask and you shall receive. Every employee has been so welcoming and friendly from Kristy at the front desk with personalized text messages to Maurice at the pool making sure we are completely satisfied. 

The outdoor spaces are exceptional with lots of seating areas and plants. It’s outdoorsy but also private in the same feel. We have loved everything about the Modernhaus in SoHo

title: Top choice in NYC Soho
text:
“Hard to choose a hotel in NYC but this is a TOP choice, worth every penny. Apart from what you can see on the website (beautiful rooms, amazing views, really nice F&B outlets) the hotel is charming and offer many spaces to relax, work or have something to drink so you can easily have a break of your day visiting. 

The area around is packed with super nice shops and restaurants. 

Last tip, Don’t miss to have a drink on the rooftop, loved by locals it was quite full of people, enought ti be súper fun. 

In general you will find real guest service, really nice and helping. Special thanks to the nicest lady that recommended us the restaurants around”

title: Amazing service
text: I just stayed here for a business trip, not only was the room beautiful and clean, but the front desk service was beyond accommodating. Most notably, Caitlyn bent over backwards in order to help me with any requests, and continuously followed up to make sure I’m happy and satisfied. Every aspect of the hotel made for an incredible experience.

title: Nice stay and very nice welcome from Kristy
text:
Very nice welcome from Kristy, she is very supportive and helped us a lot in order to find the best places in town (restaurant- bars).
Thanks you Kristy for your help and kindness.
If you need anything she always try to find the best solution for you.
Thank you

title: Wow
text: Fantastic service and staff! We loved the Jimmy on the rooftop, to be able to have. drink and a swim there is perfect. Also, we've been served by Mawell at the poll we couldn't ask for a better service!

title: I’ll be back
text: My wife and I stayed here for 5 days while visiting our daughter. I can’t say enough about the wonderful service we received from Anthony, Kristy and Jimmy, as well as Luca and Hugo on the pool deck. The pool is fantastic with an amazing view, albeit very small. The room had a fantastic view and the hotel is perfectly located and has easy access to the Hudson bike path and all the attractions. Highly recommended.

title: Great small hotel, great personal service
text: This hotel in Soho is well located close to a lot of different restaurants. We enjoyed the swimming pool almost every day of our stay. Beds, room and shower were very comfortable. Fresh drinking water in the room every day. The hotel has also bikes, so we used them every day. People working at the hotel are very friendly and willing to help and make your stay memorable. Kirsty at the hotel reception always welcomed us with a smile and a chat. She gave us several recommendations for restaurants and took care of drinks when we came back from an exhausting but fun day around the city. We felt very welcome!

title: Amazing Rooftop Staff!
text: During summer I frequent the rooftop at Modernhaus Soho. I typically spend the early hours of the day laying out and relaxing. The waitstaff is phenomenal! Maxwell who is the sole team member on the floor for the majority of the morning is incredibly kind and attentive! I would recommend spending a summer day poolside at Modernhaus to anyone who asked!

title: Best service in soho
text: Kristy is so kind! My husband and I stayed here for a week with our dog and she treated us so well. When we came back a few weeks later she complimentary upgraded us. Anthony at reception is also a gem and so friendly. Aside from the staff, the rooftop is so much fun and the veranda has great food. Would 10/10 recommend this hotel.

title: Awesome
text: Brought the wifey out to NY for the first time. As first time travelers to the city we weren’t sure what to expect. The hotel is beautiful and everyone treated us wonderfully. The rooftop pool allowed us to take some spectacular photographs that we can’t wait to show off to our friends back in Idaho! Lol. The bar has some very tasty drinks. Lifeguard max was so incredibly helpful. He made sure we were happy and comfortable despite how busy the pool was. Overall awesome experience, easy check in and out. If we get back into NY we will be back.

title: Unforgettable stay
text:
We‘ve spent one week in Modernhaus Soho, and for us it was the best choice we could ever made.
Not only the hotel is located in a fancy  and vibing neighbourhood, but our room itself was clean and tidy. Not to mention the stunning views!

But Kristy from reception topped everything. Not only she gave us a warm welcome, but took care of all our issues.
She made our stay extraordinary and special!
Thanks for going that extra mile!

title: Amazing stay! Highly recommend!
text: Stayed at the Modernhaus soho for 3 nights and it was exceptional. The service was phenomenal- Tamel, Gisella, Anthony and Mike the bartender were all helpful, professional and super kind. The rooms were clean and really modern. The cocktails and food was awesome. The rooftop pool was a fun addition also. Highly recommend this place for your stay in New York. It won’t disappoint- especially considering that the area was a win, too!

title: Terrific Service and Friendly Staff
text: I visited ModernHaus in July 2022 and had a terrific time. Highlight of my stay was the rooftop pool/bar terrace area. The lifeguard/pool supervisor was a young man named Max. Max catered to my every need and kept sunscreen and cold water available for every pool patron during a very hot day. His service was always quick and friendly, and the views of Manhattan were incredible. Would recommend for the terrific views and staff - thanks again, Max!

title: Exceptional staff <3
text:
I've never stayed at a hotel where every single staff member was genuinely kind and extremely passionate about their roles & the comfort of their guests— the staff at ModernHaus is truly exceptional.  By the end of our trip, we left feeling like the ModernHaus team was our family. 

- Front desk was always quick to answer our questions/requests without ever making us feel like we were asking for too much lol (shout-out Anthony, Gisella, Caitlin + Kristy!)
- We started our mornings at Jumpin Jacks where staff members were just the the kindest, coolest, best people ever
- Housekeeping always left the sweetest greetings and thank you notes
- Guest services were always happy to bring up our UberEats no matter how late it was 
- The doormen greeted us so warmly every time we arrived + left the building (shout-out Eric!)
- We had a bit of trouble opening our safe at one point but the engineers + manager were quick to resolve it (and even kindly offered us a new room during the process!)
- Bonus: the hotel covers the cost for Tues/Thurs Pilates on their rooftop :)

Words can't express how grateful I am for everyone's effort at ModernHaus in making sure that our stay was the best it can be— we felt welcomed and taken care of every minute of the day. 

I honestly wish I remembered everyone's names so I can give you all a shout-out— but we truly are so grateful for all of you. Thank you <3

title: Top notch stay!
text: Beautiful and modern room, very comfortable bed and pillows (i have just bought the same for my home), lots of light (nice views) through huge windows, and great location with access to Soho’s and Tribeca’s many food options. I will certainly be back!

title: A New Gem in Soho
text:
Having been recently acquired and renovated by a larger hotel group, this has been transformed into a really great boutique hotel with the added bonus of a top restaurant and excellent in house service and food. 
The staff are all super helpful. I am in NYC 30-40 nights a year and this is my new resting place. Special thanks to Tobias and Jimmy

title: Great place to stay in SOHO
text:
the rooms are very clean and the staffs are super nice.
it has 3 bars with professional bartenders and a high-end restaurants.
don't forget to visit the rooftop which has a pool and it transforms to a club with nice view in the afternoon.

title: Great staff and amenities
text: Me and my mother loved our stay at the Modernhaus. The location is perfect and the staff were phenomenal. We were taken care of and pampered throughout our stay so that the entire experience was seamless. This hotel also has some of the nicest amenities of any place I have stayed in New York. Included in the building is a beautiful gym over looking the city and a lovely rooftop pool. On the roof the lifeguard Maxwell made sure we were very comfortable and well taken care of despite it being quite busy. Mike from room service was also very characteristic and fun to talk to. Would definitely stay again!!

title: Perfect location in Soho
Great hotel with excellent staff!
text:
My wife and I just finished our stay at Modernhaus Soho. It's a really cool hotel spot with great rooftop pool/bar area (The Jimmy). Hotel guests are made to feel incredibly welcome in all areas of the hotel. Special shout-outs to: 
1) Maxwell the lifeguard & pool attendant, who went above and beyond to make our time on the rooftop safe, sunscreened, and hydrated. 
2) Caitlin at the front desk & guest services phone who was always pleasant and helpful and accommodating of our needs and our guest
3) Jimmy at bag check who was super friendly and helpful

Also to anyone like me who saw the room pics, there is not just a glass-partition that keeps the bathroom and the bedroom separate, but also an electronic roller-blind so you can have privacy in the bathroom 😅😂

title: Made me feel like a queen!
text: I had the greatest experience at Modernhaus. We came for a staycation on a super hot July 4th weekend. The front desk was amazing, room was beautiful, Maxwell made the entire pool experience amazing. I was taken care of from start to finish! My drink was never empty, I never had a wet towel, food and beverages and views all spectacular. Would recommend without hesitation and ask for Maxwell!!

title: Modern elegance
text:
I love this place!  I come here again and again.
Great location by Soho.  The staff is friendly and accomodating.  There are so many interesting spaces to explore in this modern hotel.  The rooms are well appointed and cleverly designed to accommodate all the needs of the guests.
fantastic pool deck, beautiful restaurant, and a perfect, relaxing place to have great coffee and breakfast.  The bar space is cool and the cocktails are delicious!
 Only request is to have a well curated pantry in the room so if I arrive late and the restaurant is closed I can have a drink or a snack.
Otherwise perfect!
I've stayed in most of the hotels in the area and this is the best value by far.

title: Amazing
text: Exceptional customer service - Kristy greeted us when we arrived and upgraded our room because we just got married! She gave great recommendations for dinner and coffee, manager Isael was likewise hospitable. The amenities are lovely, gorgeous rooftop pool with view is definitely a highlight. Would enthusiastically recommend!

title: Pick this hotel
text: I had an wonderful experience at modernhaus hotel the view was amazing and everyone was beyond comforting but Kristy made me feel as if she was my friend and that's what really made the stay worth it. Thank Israel for the room upgrade. Oh and the music is a vibe good Playlist

title: Top Notch Service
text: ModernHaus Soho is outstanding. The service and attentiveness of the staff were above and beyond. The rooms are beautiful, comfortable and clean. The breakfast and dinner options are delicious. We will stay there again. Thank you to Julio and others who went out of their way to make our stay amazing.

title: Rooftop Bliss
text: Spent an afternoon at the pool at Modernhaus Soho- great drinks, great vibe, such a great pooltop spot with amazing views. Highly recommend. Maxwell provided the best service and we will be back again because of it!

title: Friendly staff and great location
text: I really loved this hotel, the location is great with lots of lovely restaurants and shops. The staff were really friendly and the room was great. Only 2 negatives… I arrived at 4pm and my room wasn’t ready and I received an email a few weeks before my arrival asking if I’d like an upgrade, I responded saying I would like an upgrade but the hotel didn’t receive this email, they said it was a common problem to not receive the responses from these emails. Overall though I would return and rebook, the rooftop bar and pool were amazing!

title: Incredible Hotel!
text: We had a blast, stayed about ten days and the staff is lovely! Kristy was so helpful in everything we needed. Every day would ask if we needed something and she was super kind and always attentive, making sure we were comfortable and enjoying our stay. Really recommend!

title: Disappointed
text:
Let’s start with Check In, we were looked after by Christy who was lovely and friendly. She asked if we were planning on visiting the rooftop bar and we said most likely. She excitedly provided us with some drink cards and said to have a cocktail and mentioned we definitely should go up there during sunset as it’s beautiful. We thanked her for the drinks cards. I enquired about the rooftop pool and checked if it was reopening on Saturday 21st as per the booking.com website and she mentioned that it won’t be opening until Memorial day weekend. When I found this out, I was very disappointed as I had planned to stay at ModernHaus to utilise the rooftop pool in the mornings over the weekend. I even messaged via Booking.com to ask about the rooftop pool a couple weeks prior to check in and no one replied to my message.

 

After coming back to the room after our first night out, we noticed there was a leak in the bathroom from the ceiling. It had soaked the bath mat. As it was in the early hours of the morning we left it. When we woke up the leak had stopped, but I still alerted Christy at the front desk. I showed her the video and she said she will get someone to come up and have a look at it. No one came up to have a look.

 

We alerted Christy again on Sunday to let her know the leak was still happening and it had kept my partner up because of it. She apologised and thought because she didn’t hear from us everything was all good. She moved us to the same room on the level below and gave us two more drink cards. After a day of exploring NYC we thought we could finally use those drink cards we received at the rooftop bar and watch the sunset before going out to dinner. We get to the door and was told there was a private event on and it will reopen to the public at 9pm. To our disappointment we then opted to go for a drink at Jumping Jacks. I asked for a mocktail and was told they didn’t have any and they could make me a lemonade instead. Once again disappointed but accepted a lemonade.

 

On our last night in NYC we made sure we made time to go up to the rooftop bar for drinks to watch the sunset and to use the two drink cards. We ordered our drinks and provided the drink cards and the bartender said these can’t be redeemed here. We were certain that Christy gave us these drink cards to be used at the rooftop bar as we only spoke about the rooftop bar during check in. Once again very disappointed.

 

Also, our bottled water was not replenished daily and had to call concierge more than once to organise.

 

After extensive research on where to stay in NYC I opted for ModernHaus and was very excited. But after our stay, I must say we were very underwhelmed and did not enjoy our experience at ModernHaus.

title: Great stay!
text: Loved our stay at ModernHaus -  hotel is really clean and perfect as a base for exploring. It's such a great location to explore Soho / Greenwich / LES (our favourite parts of town) and head out to Brooklyn. The rooftop bar / pool area is great if you're looking for a buzzy vibe, although can get quite crowded. Our stay was made extra special by Tamel and Kristy, who upgraded us to an incredible room with skyline views on our first night. Kristy particularly went above and beyond to make us feel welcome throughout our stay. Will definitely be back soon!

title: Excellent service
text: The staff at this hotel are prompt, courteous and accommodating. The rooms and property are well maintained. It’s easy to walk to all the SOHO has to offer. My only complaint is the bar staff in the lounge were overwhelmed getting drinks for basically everyone in the hotel around 5 pm. It would be good for the hotel to have an extra bartender during happy hour. Regardless, I would stay again.

title: Worth every penny
text: Prime location, professional and friendly staff, good food and clean rooms ❤️ we stayed there for 7 nights and enjoyed it a lot everything was close by , didnt hear the roof or street noise . The view on the 11th floor was amazing i highly recommend it

title: Charged multiple times and took weeks to fix
text:
They charged us 5 times for our stay in 2 different cards. We had to call multiple times to get this fixed and even then it took weeks to fix. The hotel itself was not bad but the service is terrible. They do not know what they are doing.

Dont stay here, its not worth the money.

title: Name changed-Still a good hotel!  Great location
text: We were worried when “The James” changed to Modern…still a great location and solid quality.  We might be getting too old for the club vibe.  That does not reflect on the charm of this fun place!  Staff was adjusting to the new busy “normal”and did well!

title: Great hotel in Soho !
text:
I just come back from a weekend at Modernhaus soho with my father and sister, we had a very good time !

We had booked two korner studios, the room and amenities are very nice. There is everything you need and I especially appreciate the soap and creams from Le Labo. The bed was very good and i slept like a baby :)
Be carefull if you book it on booking.com, the website says that this kind of room is located only on higher levels but actually you can have a room on the lower levels too, since korner studios are located on every levels. 
We had one room on the 9th floor (my favorite) that has a amazing view and one on the 5th floor, no crazy view but a bit quieter.
In addition thare are some gardens and terraces on the 2nd floor that are pleasant.

The staff is very friendly, we had the occasion to use the bicycle offered by the hotel for a ride. It was very nice (they provide you a lock so you can stop during you ride). The breakfast is not served at the Veranda but at Jumpin Jacks. 

To make the experience more appreciable for guests, it would be nicer to set up a breakfast buffet at the veranda or at jumpin jacks since currently everything is "à la carte". Nevertheless the food is good (the pancakes are HUGE) and they provide you vouchers for free coffee at jumpin jacks in addition to expresso machines in the room.

The rooftop is a bit crowded in the evening because of Jimmy's bar and i recommand to use it during the day (when the pool is open and reserved for guest only). 

Thanks again to all the staff of Modernhaus Soho, i will visit you again in august !:)

Nicolas

title: Greatest of Soho
text: Just backed from 10 days in the hotel. Me and my sister were super enjoyed. This is my second time and I noticed that for any reason this is the right place for me. The location is great on the center of the soho but still quiet, the room and facilities were amazing but the most important for me was the service the front desk specifically Leidy Garcia was super kind, helpful and very polite. She helps me to find great places for everything (good SPA, Restaurants and etc.  no doubt that I will be back right to this hotel.

title: Great location, great time, great view
text:
I stayed here recently was loved it. A great location with gorgeous views. The roof top bar was fun with a great vibe and again - breathtaking views. The restaurant was amazing. The coffee at Jumping Jacks was RIDICULOUSLY good… seriously you must try it. 

I upgraded and stayed on the 17th floor - I was a bit nervous I may hear some noise from the roof top bar - but the room was very quiet. I had the corner room which had massive windows and lots of sunlight. I also was on the same floor at the fitness center - so got to work out and look at the skyline. Didn’t plan enough in advance to get some time with with their in house trainer  - but will definitely take advantage of that next visit!

The staff were attentive and friendly. Really enjoyed my stay - and will add this to my must stay again list!

title: Swanky Hotel, Great Staff
text: Very cool spot to land during our time in NYC. ModernHaus SoHo offers awesome views, a rooftop bar with a low-fi DJ, and Alexander Calder and KAWS art sprinkled throughout. Plus the doorman name Kenny is supreme at everything. He can get a driver to get you anywhere in minutes. We will definitely be back!

title: Excellent Hotel - perfect location
text:
We loved our stay at Modernhaus soho. Attention to detail, cleanliness, discreet and attentive staff, good quality amenities and no carpet (which, along with the view, was the main reason we chose this place).
We booked a skyline corner king room and had views of soho and a little of downtown skyline, but mostly offices so, if you can, do get as much of a higher floor as you can.
Also, be aware that it's close to hudson tunnel so there are noisy intersections in the area with heavy traffic. Didn't bother us as this is NY, but keep in mind in case you sleep light. 
Beds are really comfortable so imo sleep won't be an issue.
View from the rooftop terrace is to die for.
Veranda restaurant is great, can't recommend enough.
Subway stops to just about anywhere

title: Comfort + cool in heart of SoHo
text: This was my second stay at ModernHaus for a fun weekend away with friends. The location is perfect...nestled right in the heart of the action of SoHo. The room was very comfortable and well appointed with everything I needed to feel like home. I slept very well. We dined at Veranda (delicious!), had drinks at on the rooftop (fun!) and coffee at Jumping Jacks (yum). Another perfect weekend at ModernHaus

title: Consistently the best hotel in SoHo
text:
I just wrapped up my 3rd stay at Modernhaus in SoHo. As a frequent traveler for both business and pleasure, I can confidently say this is by far the best NYC hotel experience I’ve had. From the bell service, to reception, to housekeeping and beyond - the staff here go out of their way to ensure you are pampered and satisfied. Anything you need is a text message away. You are also just an elevator ride from one of NY’s top rated rooftop lounges with the most stunning views of the city scape that I’ve seen. Not to mention the two restaurants and their outstanding cuisine. 

Of note, the hotel recently invested in wellness programs to enhance their luxury offerings to guests. They’ve hired London’s top celebrity trainer to offer guests a variety of private fitness options during their stay. As a fitness enthusiast, I gave this a shot and it did not disappoint! This was the most thorough and technically proficient 1:1 session I’ve ever experienced. This trainer was the most engaging, fun, and knowledgeable I’ve ever met. Highly recommend! He also shared his IG @nikoalgieri

In all- great stay, great staff, prime location- a consistent 5/5. Glad I found this gem!

title: My New Go-To Hotel in New York City! This Staff is EXCEPTIONAL!
text: Thank you Modern Haus for the superb stay! This was my first visit and I am counting on many more. The staff, especially Kristy at the front desk, all went above and beyond. From Housekeeping to gym to food and beverage, no one missed a beat! I’ll bel seeing you all again!

title: Not great for business travel
text: The hotel is beautiful and well-located, but the rooms are quite loud, I could hear people walking/talking in the hallway as if they were in my room. There rooms have no working space, no desk and no desk chair. Wouldn’t recommend for business travel.

title: A fabulous option in Soho
text: I spent seven nights at the Modernhaus in mid-March.   My go-to hotel in NY was unfortunately a victim of COVID so I have been in search of a new place to stay and thought I would try this hotel.  Having stayed at this property when it was the James, this is definitely a step up.  The location is terrific as is the abundance of natural light given the large amount of windows in each room.   There were a few small glitches, however, I have to say Kristy and Evelyn at the front desk were outstanding.  Besides their super friendly demeanour when I was coming in and out of the hotel, they went out of their way to iron out a couple of small things that didn’t go right which I really appreciated.  I’m very happy to have found a new hotel from which I can base myself on both my business and personal trips to NY.

title: Mixed experience, older travelers beware!
text: This is a young, hip hotel with its best feature being the wonderful art seen everywhere, including within rooms and in hallways. But there are serious issues. Our rate included breakfast and the breakfast venue was serviced by servers who did not know what the included breakfast was so we chose the wrong items all three mornings we were there. We would have had to pay out of pocket for these items but they were comped when I explained the situation to the desk clerk. On the third morning, no one (apparently) was scheduled to work so a lone, harassed woman had to hold down the fort while we waited and waited for breakfast. She was lovely, the situation was not.
